## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-115">Unieważnienie wszystkich wpisów dynamicznych w pamięci podręcznej ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-116">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-117">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-118">Ta usługa unieważnia wszystkie dynamiczne wpisy ARP znajdujące się obecnie w pamięci podręcznej ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-119">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-120">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-121">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne unieważnienie pamięci podręcznej ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ARP nie jest włączona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowy adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-125">Obiekt wywołujący **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wątkiem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-126">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-127">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-128">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-129">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-130">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-148">Ustawianie dynamicznego wpisu ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-149">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-150">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-151">Ta usługa przydziela dynamiczny wpis z pamięci podręcznej ARP i konfiguruje określony adres IP na potrzeby mapowania adresów fizycznych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-152">Jeśli określony jest zerowy adres fizyczny, do sieci wysyłane jest rzeczywiste żądanie ARP w celu rozpoznania adresu fizycznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-153">Należy również zauważyć, że ten wpis zostanie usunięty, jeśli przedawnienie ARP jest aktywne lub jeśli pamięć podręczna ARP jest wyczerpana i jest to najmniej ostatnio używany wpis ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-154">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-155">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-156">**IP_address** Adres IP do zamapowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-157">**physical_msw** Pierwsze 16 bitów (47-32) adresu fizycznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-158">**physical_lsw** Mniejsza 32 bitów (31-0) adresu fizycznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-159">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie dynamiczny zestaw wpisów ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) nie ma więcej wpisów ARP w pamięci podręcznej ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-166">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-167">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-168">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-169">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-170">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-188">Włączanie protokołu ARP (Address Resolution Protocol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-189">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-190">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-191">Ta usługa inicjuje składnik ARP programu NetX Duo dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-192">Inicjowanie protokołu ARP obejmuje skonfigurowanie pamięci podręcznej ARP i różnych procedur przetwarzania ARP niezbędnych do wysyłania i otrzymywania wiadomości ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-193">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-194">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-195">**arp_cache_memory** Wskaźnik do obszaru pamięci, w którym ma zostać umieszczona pamięć podręczna ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-196">**arp_cache_size** Każdy wpis ARP o rozmiarze 52 bajtów, Łączna liczba wpisów ARP, w związku z tym rozmiar podzielony przez 52.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-197">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne włączenie protokołu ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub pamięci podręcznej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) podana przez użytkownika pamięć podręczna ARP jest za mała.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) ten składnik został już włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-204">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-204">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-205">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-205">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-206">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-206">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-207">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-207">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ARP and supply 1024 bytes of ARP cache memory for
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_enable(&ip_0, (void *) pointer, 1024);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-225">Usuwanie wpisu ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-226">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-227">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-228">Ta usługa usuwa wpis ARP dla danego adresu IP z tabeli wewnętrznej protokołu ARP protokołu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-229">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-230">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-231">**IP_address** Wpis ARP o określonym adresie IP powinien zostać usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-232">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne włączenie protokołu ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0X16) nie można znaleźć wpisu o określonym adresie IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub pamięci podręcznej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) określony adres IP jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-238">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-239">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-240">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-241">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-242">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-260">Wyślij żądanie żądania ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-261">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-262">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-263">Ta usługa przechodzi przez wszystkie interfejsy fizyczne, aby przesyłać żądania żądań ARP, o ile adres IP interfejsu jest prawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-264">Jeśli odpowiedź ARP zostanie następnie odebrana, dostarczona procedura obsługi odpowiedzi jest wywoływana, aby przetworzyć odpowiedź na żądanie w ramach protokołu ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-265">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-266">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-267">**response_handler** Wskaźnik do funkcji obsługi odpowiedzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-268">Jeśli podano NX_NULL, odpowiedzi są ignorowane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-269">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne wysyłanie bezpłatnego protokołu ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) Brak dostępnego pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ARP nie jest włączona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) bieżący adres IP jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-275">Obiekt wywołujący **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wątkiem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-276">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-277">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-278">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-279">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-280">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-298">Lokalizowanie fizycznego adresu sprzętowego danego adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-299">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-300">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-301">Ta usługa próbuje znaleźć fizyczny adres sprzętowy w pamięci podręcznej ARP, która jest skojarzona z podanym adresem IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-302">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-303">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-304">**IP_address** Adres IP do wyszukania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-305">**physical_msw** Wskaźnik do zmiennej w celu zwrócenia pierwszych 16 bitów (47-32) adresu fizycznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-306">**physical_lsw** Wskaźnik do zmiennej zwraca niższą 32 bitów (31-0) adresu fizycznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-307">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne znalezienie adresu sprzętowego ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP hardware address find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-309">W pamięci podręcznej ARP nie znaleziono mapowania **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-314">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-315">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-316">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-316">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-317">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-317">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-318">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-318">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the hardware address associated with the IP address of
   1.2.3.4 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                      &physical_msw,
                                      &physical_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables physical_msw and
   physical_lsw contain the hardware address.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-333">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-333">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-334">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-334">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-336">Pobierz informacje o działaniach ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-337">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-338">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-339">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o działaniach ARP dla skojarzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-340">*Jeśli wskaźnik docelowy jest NX_NULL, to konkretne informacje nie są zwracane do obiektu wywołującego*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-341">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-342">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-343">**arp_requests_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby żądań ARP wysyłanych z tego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-344">**arp_requests_received** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby odebranych żądań ARP od sieci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-345">**arp_responses_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby odpowiedzi ARP wysyłanych z tego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-346">**arp_responses_received** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej odpowiedzi ARP odebranych z sieci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej dla bieżącej liczby dynamicznych wpisów ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-348">**arp_static_entries** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej dla bieżącej liczby statycznych wpisów ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-349">**arp_aged_entries** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby wpisów ARP, które mają przestarzałe i stały się nieprawidłowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby odebranych komunikatów ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-351">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobranie informacji o ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-356">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-357">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-358">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-359">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-360">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-378">Zlokalizuj adres IP przy użyciu adresu fizycznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-379">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-380">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-381">Ta usługa próbuje znaleźć adres IP w pamięci podręcznej ARP, która jest skojarzona z podanym adresem fizycznym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-382">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-383">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-384">**IP_address** Wskaźnik do zwracanego adresu IP, jeśli został znaleziony, który został zamapowany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-385">**physical_msw** Pierwsze 16 bitów (47-32) adresu fizycznego do wyszukania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-386">**physical_lsw** Niższy 32 bitów (31-0) adresu fizycznego do wyszukania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-387">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-387">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne Znajdowanie adresu IP ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP IP address find</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-389">W pamięci podręcznej ARP nie znaleziono mapowania **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw i physical_lsw są równe 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-395">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-395">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-397">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-397">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-398">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entries_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-416">Usuń wszystkie statyczne wpisy ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-416">Delete all static ARP entries</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-417">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-417">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entries_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-418">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-418">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-419">Ta usługa usuwa wszystkie wpisy statyczne w pamięci podręcznej ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-420">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-421">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-422">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-423">Wpisy statyczne **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) są usuwane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Static entries are deleted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowy wskaźnik ip_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-427">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-428">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-428">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-429">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-429">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-430">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-431">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-431">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete all the static ARP entries for IP Instance 0, assuming
   "ip_0" is the NX_IP structure for IP Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entries_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS all static ARP entries in the ARP cache
   have been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-449">Tworzenie statycznego adresu IP na potrzeby mapowania sprzętowego w pamięci podręcznej ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-450">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-451">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-452">Ta usługa tworzy statyczne mapowanie adresów IP na fizyczne w pamięci podręcznej ARP dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-453">Statyczne wpisy ARP nie podlegają okresowym aktualizacji protokołu ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-454">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-455">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-456">**IP_address** Adres IP do zamapowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-457">**physical_msw** Pierwsze 16 bitów (47-32) adresu fizycznego do mapowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-458">**physical_lsw** Mniejsza 32 bitów (31-0) adresu fizycznego do mapowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-459">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne utworzenie wpisu statycznego ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) nie ma więcej wpisów ARP w pamięci podręcznej ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw i physical_lsw są równe 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-467">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-468">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-469">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-470">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-471">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-489">Usuń statyczny adres IP do mapowania sprzętowego w pamięci podręcznej ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-490">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-490">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-491">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-492">Ta usługa wyszukuje i usuwa wcześniej utworzone mapowanie statycznego adresu IP na adres fizyczny w pamięci podręcznej ARP dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-493">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-494">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-495">**IP_address** Statyczny adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-496">**physical_msw** 16 najważniejszych bitów (47-\* \* 32) adresów fizycznych, które zostały zmapowane statycznie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-497">**physical_lsw** Niższy 32 bitów (31-\* \* 0) adresu fizycznego, który został zamapowany statycznie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-498">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne usunięcie wpisu statycznego ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-500">W pamięci podręcznej ARP nie znaleziono wpisu statycznego ARP **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw i physical_lsw są równe 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-506">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-507">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-507">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-508">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-509">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-510">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-510">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created static ARP entry
   was successfully deleted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-523">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-523">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-524">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-524">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-528">Włącz protokół ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-529">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-530">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-531">Ta usługa włącza składnik ICMP dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-532">Składnik ICMP jest odpowiedzialny za obsługę internetowych komunikatów o błędach i żądań ping i odpowiedzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-533">\*Ta usługa włącza tylko protokół ICMP dla usługi IPv4. Aby włączyć zarówno ICMPv4, jak i ICMPv6, aplikacje używają usługi \*\*nxd_icmp_enable\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-534">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-535">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-536">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne włączenie protokołu ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) Protokół ICMP jest już włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-541">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-542">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-543">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-544">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-545">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-545">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-554">Pobierz informacje o działaniach ICMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-554">Retrieve information about ICMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-555">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-555">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *pings_sent,
    ULONG *ping_timeouts,
    ULONG *ping_threads_suspended,
    ULONG *ping_responses_received,
    ULONG *icmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *icmp_unhandled_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-556">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-557">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o działaniach ICMP dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-557">This service retrieves information about ICMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-558">*Jeśli wskaźnik docelowy jest NX_NULL, to konkretne informacje nie są zwracane do obiektu wywołującego*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-558">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-559">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-560">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-560">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-561">**pings_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby wysłanych pakietów ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-561">**pings_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of pings sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-562">**ping_timeouts** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby limitów czasu polecenia ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-562">**ping_timeouts** Pointer to destination for the total number of ping timeouts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby wątków zawieszonych w żądaniach ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pointer to destination of the total number of threads suspended on ping requests.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-564">**ping_responses_received** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby odebranych odpowiedzi ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-564">**ping_responses_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of ping responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby błędów sumy kontrolnej protokołu ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of ICMP checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego całkowitej liczby nieobsłużonych komunikatów ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of un-handled ICMP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-567">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobranie informacji protokołu ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-572">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-573">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-573">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-574">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-574">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-575">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-575">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-576">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-576">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve ICMP information from previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_info_get(&ip_0, &pings_sent, &ping_timeouts,
                          &ping_threads_suspended,
                          &ping_responses_received,
                          &icmp_checksum_errors,
                          &icmp_unhandled_messages);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-584">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-584">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-585">Wyślij żądanie ping do określonego adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-585">Send ping request to specified IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-586">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-586">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    CHAR *data, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-587">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-588">Ta usługa wysyła żądanie ping do określonego adresu IP i czeka przez określony czas dla komunikatu odpowiedzi na polecenie ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-588">This service sends a ping request to the specified IP address and waits for the specified amount of time for a ping response message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-589">Jeśli odpowiedź nie zostanie odebrana, zwracany jest błąd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-589">If no response is received, an error is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-590">W przeciwnym razie cały komunikat odpowiedzi jest zwracany w zmiennej wskazywanej przez response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-590">Otherwise, the entire response message is returned in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-591">Aby wysłać żądanie ping do docelowego adresu IPv6, aplikacje używają usługi \***nxd_icmp_ping** _ lub _ \*_nxd_icmp_source_ping_\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-591">To send a ping request to an IPv6 destination, applications shall use the ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ or _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-592">*Jeśli NX_SUCCESS jest zwracana, aplikacja jest odpowiedzialna za zwolnienie odebranego pakietu, gdy nie jest już potrzebne*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-592">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-593">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-594">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-594">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-595">**IP_address** Adres IP w kolejności bajtów hosta do ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-595">**ip_address** IP address, in host byte order, to ping.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-596">**dane** Wskaźnik do obszaru danych dla wiadomości ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-596">**data** Pointer to data area for ping message.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-597">**data_size** Liczba bajtów w danych ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-597">**data_size** Number of bytes in the ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-598">**response_ptr** Wskaźnik na wskaźnik pakietu, aby przywrócić komunikat odpowiedzi ping w.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-598">**response_ptr** Pointer to packet pointer to return the ping response message in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-599">**WAIT_OPTION** Definiuje liczbę cykli czasomierza ThreadX, które oczekują na odpowiedź ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-599">**wait_option** Defines the number of ThreadX timer ticks to wait for a ping response.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-600">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-600">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-601">Opcja oczekiwania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-601">Wait Option</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-602">Wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-602">Value</span></span>                           |
| -----------------------|---------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span></span>             | <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-604">0x00000000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-604">(0x00000000)</span></span>                    |
| <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-605">wartość limitu czasu w taktach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-605">timeout value in ticks</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-606">(0x00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-606">(0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>                      |

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-609">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-609">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne polecenie ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-611">Wskaźnik komunikatu odpowiedzi został umieszczony w zmiennej wskazywanej przez response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-611">Response message pointer was placed in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) nie może przydzielić pakietu żądania ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Unable to allocate a ping request packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) określony obszar danych przekracza domyślny rozmiar pakietu dla tego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Specified data area exceeds the default packet size for this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0X29) żądany adres IP nie odpowiedział.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Requested IP did not respond.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-615">Zażądane zawieszenie **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) zostało przerwane przez wywołanie tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub odpowiedzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-620">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-620">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-621">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-621">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-622">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-622">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-623">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-623">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-624">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-624">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Issue a ping to IP address 1.2.3.5 from the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_ping(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5), "abcd", 4,
                      &response_ptr, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, a ping response was received from IP
   address 1.2.3.5 and the response packet is contained in the
   packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same "abcd"
   four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-632">nx_igmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-632">nx_igmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-633">Włącz protokół IGMP (Internet Group Management Protocol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-633">Enable Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-634">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-634">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-635">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-635">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-636">Ta usługa włącza składnik IGMP w określonym wystąpieniu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-636">This service enables the IGMP component on the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-637">Składnik IGMP jest odpowiedzialny za zapewnienie wsparcia dla operacji zarządzania grupami multiemisji IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-637">The IGMP component is responsible for providing support for IP multicast group management operations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-638">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-638">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-639">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-639">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-640">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne włączenie protokołu IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) ten składnik został już włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-645">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-645">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-646">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-646">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-647">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-647">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-648">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-648">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-649">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-649">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP is enabled. */
```
