## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1439">Wyczyść adres bramy IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1439">Clear the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1440">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1440">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1441">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1441">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1442">Ta usługa czyści adres bramy IPv4 skonfigurowany w wystąpieniu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1442">This service clears the IPv4 gateway address configured in the instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1443">Aby wyczyścić domyślnie zewnętrzny adres IPv6 z wystąpienia IP, aplikacje używają ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete usługi.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1443">To clear an IPv6 default outer from the IP instance, applications shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1444">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1444">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1445">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1445">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1446">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1446">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie wyczyścił adres bramy IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared the IP gateway address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowy blok kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1449">Usługa **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wywoływana z inicjalizacji systemu lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1450">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1451">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1451">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1452">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1452">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1453">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1453">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1454">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1454">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Clear the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   cleared from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1458">Pobierz adres bramy IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1458">Get the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1459">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1460">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1461">Ta usługa Pobiera adres bramy IPv4 skonfigurowany w wystąpieniu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1461">This service retrieves the IPv4 gateway address configured in the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1462">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1463">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1463">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1464">**IP_address** Wskaźnik do pamięci, w której jest przechowywany adres bramy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1464">**ip_address** Pointer to the memory where the gateway address is stored</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1465">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne uzyskanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresu IP lub wskaźnik adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or ip address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1468">Nie znaleziono adresu bramy **NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Gateway address not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1469">Nie wywołano **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) S nazwa z inicjalizacji systemowej lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1471">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1471">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1472">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1472">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1474">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1474">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG ip_address;

/* Get the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1487">Ustaw adres IP bramy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1487">Set Gateway IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1488">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1488">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1489">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1490">Ta usługa ustawia adres IP bramy IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1490">This service sets the IPv4 gateway IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1491">Cały ruch poza siecią jest kierowany do tej bramy na potrzeby transmisji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1491">All out-of-network traffic are routed to this gateway for transmission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1492">Brama musi być bezpośrednio dostępna za pomocą jednego z interfejsów sieciowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1492">The gateway must be directly accessible through one of the network interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1493">Aby skonfigurować adres bramy IPv6, należy użyć ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add usługi.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1493">To configure IPv6 gateway address, use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1494">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1494">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1495">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1495">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1496">**IP_address** Adres IP bramy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1496">**ip_address** IP address of the gateway.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1497">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślny zbiór adresów IP bramy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful Gateway IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1502">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1503">Inicjalizacja, wątek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1503">Initialization, thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1504">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1504">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1505">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1505">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1506">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1506">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup the Gateway address for previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,99);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, all out-of-network send requests are
   routed to 1.2.3.99. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1519">Pobierz informacje o działaniach IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1519">Retrieve information about IP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1520">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1520">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_received,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_received,
    ULONG *ip_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *ip_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_receive_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *ip_send_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_received);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1521">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1522">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o działaniach IP dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1522">This service retrieves information about IP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1523">*Jeśli wskaźnik docelowy jest NX_NULL, to konkretne informacje nie są zwracane do obiektu wywołującego*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1523">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1524">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1525">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1525">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby wysłanych pakietów IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of IP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby wysłanych bajtów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby pakietów odbioru adresów IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby odebranych bajtów IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby nieprawidłowych pakietów IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby porzuconych pakietów odebranych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby błędów sumy kontrolnej w pakietach odbierania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of checksum errors in receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby porzuconych pakietów do wysłania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of send packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby wysłanych fragmentów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby odebranych fragmentów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1536">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie informacji o adresie IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1540">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1540">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1541">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1541">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1542">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1542">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1543">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1543">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1544">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1544">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_ip_info_get(&ip_0,
                        &ip_total_packets_sent,
                        &ip_total_bytes_sent,
                        &ip_total_packets_received,
                        &ip_total_bytes_received,
                        &ip_invalid_packets,
                        &ip_receive_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_receive_checksum_errors,
                        &ip_send_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_total_fragments_sent,
                        &ip_total_fragments_received);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1570">Pobieranie adresu IP interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1570">Retrieve interface IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1571">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1571">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_get (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1572">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1572">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1573">Ta usługa Pobiera adres IPv4 określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1573">This service retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1574">Aby można było pobrać adres IPv6, aplikacja używa usługi ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1574">To retrieve IPv6 address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1575">*Określone urządzenie, jeśli nie urządzenie podstawowe, musi być wcześniej dołączone do wystąpienia IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1575">*The specified device, if not the primary device, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1576">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1576">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1577">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1577">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1578">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu, taka sama jak wartość indeksu do interfejsu sieciowego dołączonego do wystąpienia protokołu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1578">**interface_index** Interface index, the same value as the index to the network interface attached to the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1579">**IP_address** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla adresu IP interfejsu urządzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1579">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for the device interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1580">**network_mask** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla maski sieci interfejsu urządzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1580">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for the device interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1581">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) określony interfejs sieciowy jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1586">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1587">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1587">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1588">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1589">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1589">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1590">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1590">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Get device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_get(ip_ptr,INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     &ip_address,
                                     &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1605">Skonfiguruj, czy jest wymagana mapowanie adresów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1605">Configure whether address mapping is needed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1606">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1606">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT mapping_needed);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1607">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1608">Ta usługa określa, czy adres IP do mapowania adresów MAC jest wymagany dla określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1608">This service configures whether IP address to MAC address mapping is needed for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1609">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana z sterownika urządzenia interfejsu w celu powiadomienia stosu IP, czy źródłowy interfejs wymaga adresu IP do mapowania na dwie warstwy (MAC).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1609">This service is typically called from the interface device driver to notify the IP stack whether the underlying interface requires IP address to layer two (MAC) address mapping.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1610">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1611">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1611">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1612">**interface_index** Indeksowanie do interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1612">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE — mapowanie adresów jest zbędne NX_FALSE--nie jest wymagana mapowanie adresu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE -- address mapping needed NX_FALSE -- address mapping not needed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1614">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne skonfigurowanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1616">Indeks urządzenia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1618">Usługa **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wywoływana z inicjalizacji systemu lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1619">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1620">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1620">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1621">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1621">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1622">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1623">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1623">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UCHAR mapping_needed = NX_TRUE;

/* Configure address mapping needed specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(&ip_0,
                                             PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                             mapping_needed);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the address mapping needed was
   successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1638">Ustaw adres IP interfejsu i maskę sieci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1638">Set interface IP address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1639">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1639">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1640">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1640">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1641">Ta usługa ustawia adres IPv4 i maskę sieci dla określonego interfejsu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1641">This service sets the IPv4 address and network mask for the specified IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1642">Aby skonfigurować adres interfejsu IPv6, aplikacja używa ***nxd_ipv6_address_set*** usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1642">To configure IPv6 interface address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span></span> 
 
> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1643">*Określony interfejs musi być wcześniej dołączony do wystąpienia IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1643">*The specified interface must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1644">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1644">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1645">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1645">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1646">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu dołączonego do wystąpienia NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1646">**interface_index** Index of the interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1647">**IP_address** Nowy adres IP interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1647">**ip_address** New network interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1648">**network_mask** Nowa maska sieci interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1648">**network_mask** New interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1649">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1650">Pomyślny zestaw adresów IP **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1650">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) określony interfejs sieciowy jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe wskaźniki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1655">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1656">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1656">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1657">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1657">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1658">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1659">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1659">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Set device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_set(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     ip_address,
                                     network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface IP address and mask was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1674">Dołącz interfejs sieciowy do wystąpienia protokołu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1674">Attach network interface to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1675">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1675">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_attach(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *interface_name,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask,
    VOID(*ip_link_driver)(struct NX_IP_DRIVER_STRUCT *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1676">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1677">Ta usługa dodaje fizyczny interfejs sieciowy do interfejsu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1677">This service adds a physical network interface to the IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1678">Należy zauważyć, że wystąpienie IP jest tworzone przy użyciu interfejsu podstawowego, więc każdy dodatkowy interfejs jest pomocniczy dla interfejsu podstawowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1678">Note the IP instance is created with the primary interface so each additional interface is secondary to the primary interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1679">Łączna liczba interfejsów sieciowych dołączonych do wystąpienia IP (łącznie z interfejsem podstawowym) nie może przekroczyć **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1679">The total number of network interfaces attached to the IP instance (including the primary interface) cannot exceed **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1680">Jeśli wątek IP nie został jeszcze uruchomiony, interfejsy pomocnicze zostaną zainicjowane w ramach procesu uruchamiania wątku IP, który inicjuje wszystkie interfejsy fizyczne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1680">If the IP thread has not been running yet, the secondary interfaces will be initialized as part of the IP thread startup process that initializes all physical interfaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1681">Jeśli wątek IP nie jest jeszcze uruchomiony, interfejs pomocniczy jest inicjowany w ramach usługi ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1681">If the IP thread is not running yet, the secondary interface is initialized as part of the ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1682">*ip_ptr musi wskazywać prawidłową strukturę IP NetX Duo. Należy skonfigurować **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** dla liczby interfejsów sieciowych dla wystąpienia protokołu IP. Wartość domyślna to 1*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1682">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** must be configured for the number of network interfaces for the IP instance. The default value is one*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1683">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1683">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1684">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1684">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1685">**INTERFACE_NAME** Wskaźnik do ciągu nazwy interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1685">**interface_name** Pointer to interface name string.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1686">**IP_address** Adres IP urządzenia w kolejności bajtów hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1686">**ip_address** Device IP address in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1687">**network_mask** Maska sieci urządzenia w kolejności bajtów hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1687">**network_mask** Device network mask in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1688">**ip_link_driver** Sterownik Ethernet dla interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1688">**ip_link_driver** Ethernet driver for the interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1689">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1689">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1690">Wpis **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) jest dodawany do statycznej tabeli routingu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) Maksymalna liczba interfejsów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Max number of interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1692">Przekroczono NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1693">Jeśli jest włączony protokół IPv6, ten błąd może również wskazywać, że sterownik może nie mieć wystarczającej ilości zasobów, aby obsłużyć operacje multiemisji IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1693">If IPv6 is enabled, this error may also indicate that the driver may not have enough resource to handle IPv6 multicast operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) podany adres IP jest już używany w tym wystąpieniu adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wejściowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowe dane wejściowe adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address input.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1698">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1699">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1699">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1700">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1700">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1701">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1701">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1702">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1702">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Attach secondary device for device IP address 192.168.1.68 with
   the specified Ethernet driver. */
status = nx_ip_interface_attach(ip_ptr, “secondary_port”,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,68),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                nx_etherDriver);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface was successfully added to
   the IP instance interface table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1717">Pobierz możliwości sprzętowe interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1717">Get interface hardware capability</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1718">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1718">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *interface_capability_flag);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1719">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1720">Ta usługa Pobiera flagę możliwości z określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1720">This service retrieves the capability flag from the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1721">Aby można było korzystać z tej usługi, biblioteka NetX Duo musi być skompilowana przy użyciu opcji ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** włączone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1721">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1722">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1722">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1723">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1723">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1724">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1724">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Wskaźnik do przestrzeni pamięci dla flagi możliwości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Pointer to memory space for the capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1726">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1726">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie uzyskał informacje o możliwościach interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully obtained interface capability information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1728">Funkcja interfejsu **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest obsługiwana w tej kompilacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1729">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresu IP lub nieprawidłowy wskaźnik flagi możliwości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or Invalid capability flag pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1731">Usługa **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wywoływana z inicjalizacji systemu lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1734">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1736">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1736">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       capability_flag;

/* Get the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_get(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        &capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the capability flag from the primary
   interface was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1751">Ustaw flagę możliwości sprzętu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1751">Set the hardware capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1752">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1752">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG interface_capability_flag);
```                           
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1753">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1753">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1754">Ta usługa jest używana przez sterownik urządzenia sieciowego do konfigurowania flagi możliwości dla określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1754">This service is used by the network device driver to configure the capability flag for a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1755">Aby można było korzystać z tej usługi, biblioteka NetX Duo musi być skompilowana z użyciem opcji ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** zdefiniowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1755">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be compiled with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1756">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1756">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1757">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1757">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1758">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1758">**interface_index** Index of network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Flaga możliwości dla danych wyjściowych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Capability flag for output</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1760">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił flagę możliwości sprzętowych interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set interface hardware capability flag.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1762">Funkcja interfejsu **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest obsługiwana w tej kompilacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1763">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1765">Nie wywołano **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) S nazwa z inicjalizacji systemowej lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1766">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1766">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1767">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1767">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1768">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1768">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1769">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1769">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1770">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1770">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG capability_flag = \
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_TX_CHECKSUM |\
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_RX_CHECKSUM;
UINT device_index = 0;

/* Set the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_set(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the hardware capability flag was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1785">Odłączanie określonego interfejsu z wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1785">Detach the specified interface from the IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1786">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1786">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1787">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1788">Ta usługa odłącza określony interfejs IP od wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1788">This service detaches the specified IP interface from the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1789">Po odłączeniu interfejsu wszystkie zamknięte połączone gniazda TCP oraz wpisy pamięci podręcznej i ARP dla tego interfejsu zostaną usunięte z odpowiednich tabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1789">Once an interface is detached, all connected TCP sockets closed, and ND cache and ARP entries for this interface are removed from their respective tables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1790">Członkostwa IGMP dla tego interfejsu są usuwane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1790">IGMP memberships for this interface are removed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1791">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1791">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1792">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1792">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1793">**indeks** Indeks interfejsu, który ma zostać usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1793">**index** Index of the interface to be removed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1794">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie usunął interfejs fizyczny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed a physical interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) określony interfejs sieciowy jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe wskaźniki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1798">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1799">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1799">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1800">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1800">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1801">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1801">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1802">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1802">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Detach interface 1. */
status = nx_ip_interface_detach(&IP_0, INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface is successfully detached
   from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1817">Pobierz parametry interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1817">Retrieve network interface parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1818">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1818">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    CHAR **interface_name,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask,
    ULONG *mtu_size,
    ULONG *physical_address_msw,
    ULONG *physical_address_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1819">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1820">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o parametrach sieci dla określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1820">This service retrieves information on network parameters for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1821">Wszystkie dane są pobierane w kolejności bajtów hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1821">All data are retrieved in host byte order.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1822">*ip_ptr musi wskazywać prawidłową strukturę IP NetX Duo. Określony interfejs, jeśli nie jest interfejsem podstawowym, musi być wcześniej dołączony do wystąpienia IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1822">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. The specified interface, if not the primary interface, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1823">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1823">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1824">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1824">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1825">**interface_index** Indeks określający interfejs sieciowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1825">**interface_index** Index specifying network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1826">**INTERFACE_NAME** Wskaźnik do buforu, który zawiera nazwę interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1826">**interface_name** Pointer to the buffer that holds the name of the network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1827">**IP_address** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej dla adresu IP interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1827">**ip_address** Pointer to the destination for the IP address of the interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1828">**network_mask** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla maski sieci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1828">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1829">**mtu_size** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla maksymalnej jednostki transferu dla tego interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1829">**mtu_size** Pointer to destination for maximum transfer unit for this interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1830">**physical_address_msw** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla pierwszych 16 bitów adresu MAC urządzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1830">**physical_address_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla niższych 32 bitów adresu MAC urządzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1832">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1832">Return Values</span></span>   

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1833">Uzyskano informacje o interfejsie **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Interface information has been obtained.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wejściowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1836">Usługa **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wywoływana z inicjalizacji systemu lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1837">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1837">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1838">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1838">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1839">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1839">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1840">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1840">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1841">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1841">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve interface parameters for the specified interface (index
   1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ip_interface_info_get(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                  &name_ptr, &ip_address,
                                  &network_mask,
                                  &mtu_size,
                                  &physical_address_msw,
                                  &physical_address_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface information is
   successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_mtu_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1856">Ustawianie wartości MTU interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1856">Set the MTU value of a network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1857">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1857">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG mtu_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1858">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1859">Ta usługa jest używana przez sterownik urządzenia do konfigurowania wartości IP jednostki MTU dla określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1859">This service is used by the device driver to configure the IP MTU value for the specified network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1860">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1861">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1861">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1862">**interface_index** Indeksowanie do interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1862">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1863">**mtu_size** Rozmiar jednostki MTU protokołu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1864">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1864">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wartość MTU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set MTU value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1866">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1868">Usługa **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wywoływana z inicjalizacji systemu lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1869">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1869">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1870">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1870">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1871">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1871">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1872">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1872">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1873">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1873">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       mtu_size = 1500;

/* Set the MTU size of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(&ip_0,
                                 PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mtu_size);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the MTU size was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1888">Pobieranie adresu fizycznego urządzenia sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1888">Get the physical address of a network device</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1889">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1889">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1890">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1890">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1891">Ta usługa Pobiera adres fizyczny interfejsu sieciowego z wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1891">This service retrieves the physical address of a network interface from the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1892">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1892">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1893">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1893">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1894">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1894">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1895">**physical_msw** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla pierwszych 16 bitów adresu MAC urządzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1895">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1896">**physical_lsw** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla niższych 32 bitów adresu MAC urządzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1896">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1897">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1897">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne uzyskanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1899">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku lub adresu fizycznego kontroli adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1901">Usługa **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wywoływana z inicjalizacji systemu lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1902">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1902">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1903">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1903">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1904">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1904">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1905">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1905">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1906">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1906">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG   physical_msw;
ULONG   physical_lsw;

/* Get the physical address of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              &physical_msw,
                                              &physical_lsw);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1921">Ustaw adres fizyczny dla określonego interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1921">Set the physical address for a specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1922">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1922">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT update_driver);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1923">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1924">Ta usługa jest używana przez aplikację lub sterownik urządzenia w celu skonfigurowania adresu fizycznego adresu MAC określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1924">This service is used by the application or a device driver to configure the physical address of the MAC address of the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1925">Nowy adres MAC jest stosowany do bloku sterowania struktury interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1925">The new MAC address is applied to the control block of the interface structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1926">Jeśli flaga ***update_driver*** jest ustawiona, zostanie wystawione polecenie poziomu sterownika, aby sterownik urządzenia mógł zaktualizować swój adres MAC zaprogramowany do kontrolera Ethernet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1926">If the ***update_driver*** flag is set, a driver-level command is issued so the device driver is able to update its MAC address programmed into the Ethernet controller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1927">W typowym przypadku ta usługa jest wywoływana ze sterownika urządzenia interfejsu podczas fazy inicjalizacji w celu powiadomienia stosu IP swojego adresu MAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1927">In a typical situation, this service is called from the interface device driver during initialization phase to notify the IP stack of its MAC address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1928">W takim przypadku flaga ***update_driver*** nie powinna być ustawiona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1928">In this case, the ***update_driver*** flag should not be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1929">Tę procedurę można również wywołać z poziomu aplikacji użytkownika, aby ponownie skonfigurować adres MAC interfejsu w czasie wykonywania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1929">This routine can also be called from user application to reconfigure the interface MAC address at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1930">W tym przypadku użycia flaga ***update_driver*** powinna być ustawiona, aby nowy adres MAC mógł zostać zastosowany do sterownika urządzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1930">In this use case, the ***update_driver*** flag should be set, so the new MAC address can be applied to the device driver.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1931">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1932">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1932">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1933">**interface_index** Indeksowanie do interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1933">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1934">**physical_msw** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla pierwszych 16 bitów adresu MAC urządzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1934">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1935">**physical_lsw** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla niższych 32 bitów adresu MAC urządzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1935">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1936">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1937">Pomyślne ustawienie **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1938">Polecenie **NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) nie zostało rozpoznane przez sterownik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) Command not recognized by the driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1939">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1941">Usługa **NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) nie jest wywoływana z inicjalizacji systemu lub kontekstu wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1942">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1943">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1944">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1945">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-1946">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-1946">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       physical_msw = 0x00CF;
ULONG       physical_lsw = 0x01020304;

/* Set the physical address of specified device. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              physical_msw,
                                              physical_lsw,
                                              NX_TRUE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   set. */
```
