- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2464">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2464">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2466">Dołącz wystąpienie IP do określonej grupy multiemisji za pośrednictwem interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2466">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2467">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2467">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2468">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2469">Ta usługa sprzęga wystąpienie IP z określoną grupą multiemisji za pośrednictwem określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2469">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2470">Gdy wystąpienie protokołu IP zostanie przyłączone do grupy multiemisji, logika odbierania IP rozpocznie przekazywanie pakietów danych z grupy nadawanie multiemisji do górnej warstwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2470">Once the IP instance joins a multicast group, the IP receive logic starts to forward data packets from the give multicast group to the upper layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2471">Należy zauważyć, że ta usługa przyłącza grupę multiemisji bez wysyłania raportów IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2471">Note that this service joins a multicast group without sending IGMP reports.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2472">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2472">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2473">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2473">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2474">**group_address** Adres grupy multiemisji IP klasy D do przyłączenia w kolejności bajtów hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2474">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2475">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu dołączonego do wystąpienia NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2475">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2476">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2476">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne dołączenie do grupy multiemisji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) nie można przyłączyć więcej grup multiemisji, Przekroczono maksymalną liczbę.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik do wystąpienia adresu IP lub nieprawidłowe wystąpienie adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0X14) protokół IGMP nie jest włączony w tym wystąpieniu protokołu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled in this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2482">Podany adres grupy multiemisji **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) nie jest prawidłowym adresem klasy D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2483">Indeks urządzenia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) wskazuje nieprawidłowy interfejs sieciowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2484">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2485">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2485">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2486">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2486">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2487">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2487">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2488">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2488">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2493">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2493">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2494">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2494">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2495">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2495">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2496">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2496">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2497">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2497">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2498">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2498">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2501">Pozostaw określoną grupę multiemisji za pośrednictwem interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2501">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2502">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2502">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2503">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2504">Ta usługa pozostawia określoną grupę multiemisji za pośrednictwem określonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2504">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2505">Po opuszczeniu grupy ta usługa nie wyzwala komunikatów IGMP, które są generowane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2505">After leaving the group, this service does not trigger IGMP messages being generated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2506">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2506">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2507">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2507">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2508">**group_address** Adres grupy multiemisji IP klasy D do opuszczenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2508">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2509">Adres IP znajduje się w kolejności bajtów hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2509">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2510">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu dołączonego do wystąpienia NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2510">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2511">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2511">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne dołączenie do grupy multiemisji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) nie można odnaleźć określonego adresu grupy multiemisji w lokalnej tabeli multiemisji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2514">Indeks urządzenia **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) wskazuje nieprawidłowy interfejs sieciowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2515">Podany adres grupy multiemisji **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) nie jest prawidłowym adresem klasy D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik do wystąpienia adresu IP lub nieprawidłowe wystąpienie adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2518">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2518">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2519">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2519">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2520">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2520">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2521">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2522">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2522">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2536">Przydziel pakiet z określonej puli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2536">Allocate packet from specified pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_allocate(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG packet_type,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2538">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2539">Ta usługa przydziela pakiet z określonej puli i dostosowuje wskaźnik dołączania w pakiecie zgodnie z typem określonego pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2539">This service allocates a packet from the specified pool and adjusts the prepend pointer in the packet according to the type of packet specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2540">Jeśli pakiet nie jest dostępny, usługa zawiesza się zgodnie z podaną opcją oczekiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2540">If no packet is available, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2541">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2542">**pool_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonej puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2542">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2543">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik do wskaźnika przydzieloną wskaźnik pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2543">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the Pointer of the allocated packet Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2544">**packet_type** Definiuje typ żądanego pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2544">**packet_type** Defines the type of packet requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2545">Zobacz sekcję "pule pakietów" na stronie 63 w rozdziale 3, aby zapoznać się z listą obsługiwanych typów pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2545">See “Packet Pools” on page 63 in Chapter 3 for a list of supported packet types.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2546">**WAIT_OPTION** Definiuje czas oczekiwania w taktach, jeśli w puli pakietów nie ma dostępnych pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2546">**wait_option** Defines the wait time in ticks if there are no packets available in the packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2547">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2547">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2550">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0X00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2550">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2551">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2551">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2552">Pomyślna alokacja pakietu **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet allocate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) Brak dostępnego pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2554">Zażądane zawieszenie **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) zostało przerwane przez wywołanie tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2555">Rozmiar pakietu **NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) nie może obsługiwać protokołu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) Nieprawidłowy typ pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid packet type.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowa Pula lub wskaźnik powrotu pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowa opcja oczekiwania z niewątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2559">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2560">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze i procedury ISR (sterowniki sieciowe aplikacji).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2560">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2561">Opcja oczekiwania musi być *NX_NO_WAIT* , gdy jest używana w trybie ISR lub w kontekście czasomierza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2561">Wait option must be *NX_NO_WAIT* when used in ISR or in timer context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2562">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2562">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2563">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2563">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2564">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2564">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Allocate a new UDP packet from the previously created packet pool
   and suspend for a maximum of 5 timer ticks if the pool is
   empty. */
status = nx_packet_allocate(&pool_0, &packet_ptr,
                            NX_UDP_PACKET, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the newly allocated packet pointer is
   found in the variable packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_copy"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2578">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2578">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2579">Kopiuj pakiet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2579">Copy packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2580">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2580">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_copy(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **new_packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2581">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2582">Ta usługa kopiuje informacje z dostarczonego pakietu do jednego lub kilku nowych pakietów, które są przydzielono z dostarczonej puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2582">This service copies the information in the supplied packet to one or more new packets that are allocated from the supplied packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2583">Jeśli to się powiedzie, wskaźnik do nowego pakietu jest zwracany w miejscu docelowym wskazywanym przez **new_packet_ptr**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2583">If successful, the pointer to the new packet is returned in destination pointed to by **new_packet_ptr**.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2584">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2585">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik na pakiet źródłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2585">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego, do którego ma zostać zwrócony wskaźnik do nowej kopii pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pointer to the destination of where to return the pointer to the new copy of the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2587">**pool_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonej puli pakietów, która jest używana do przydzielenia jednego lub większej liczby pakietów do kopiowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2587">**pool_ptr** Pointer to the previously created packet pool that is used to allocate one or more packets for the copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2588">**WAIT_OPTION** Definiuje, w jaki sposób usługa czeka, jeśli nie ma dostępnych pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2588">**wait_option** Defines how the service waits if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2589">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2589">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2592">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0X00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2592">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2593">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2593">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2594">Pomyślna kopia pakietu **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2595">Pakiet **NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) nie jest dostępny do kopiowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Packet not available for copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0X12) pusty pakiet źródłowy lub kopiowanie nie powiodło się.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Empty source packet or copy failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2597">Zażądane zawieszenie **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) zostało przerwane przez wywołanie tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2598">Rozmiar pakietu **NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) nie może obsługiwać protokołu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowa Pula, pakiet lub wskaźnik docelowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0X02) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik dołączania do pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik dołączania pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) opcja oczekiwania została określona w inicjalizacji lub w ramach procedury ISR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) A wait option was specified in initialization or in an ISR.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2603">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2604">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze i procedury ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2604">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2605">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2605">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2606">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2606">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2607">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2607">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET *new_copy_ptr;

/* Copy packet pointed to by "old_packet_ptr" using packets from
   previously created packet pool_0. */
status = nx_packet_copy(old_packet, &new_copy_ptr, &pool_0, 20);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, new_copy_ptr points to the packet copy. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_append"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2622">Dołącz dane do końca pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2622">Append data to end of packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2623">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_append(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *data_start, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2624">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2625">Ta usługa dołącza dane na końcu określonego pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2625">This service appends data to the end of the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2626">Dostarczony obszar danych jest kopiowany do pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2626">The supplied data area is copied into the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2627">Jeśli jest za mało dostępnej pamięci, a funkcja pakiet łańcucha jest włączona, co najmniej jeden pakiet zostanie przydzielony do spełnienia żądania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2627">If there is not enough memory available, and the chained packet feature is enabled, one or more packets will be allocated to satisfy the request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2628">Jeśli funkcja pakietu łańcucha nie jest włączona, zostanie zwrócona *NX_SIZE_ERROR* .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2628">If the chained packet feature is not enabled, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2629">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2630">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2630">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2631">**data_start** Wskaźnik na początek obszaru danych użytkownika do dołączenia do pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2631">**data_start** Pointer to the start of the user’s data area to append to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2632">**data_size** Rozmiar obszaru danych użytkownika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2632">**data_size** Size of user’s data area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2633">**pool_ptr** Wskaźnik do puli pakietów, z której ma zostać przydzielony inny pakiet, jeśli w bieżącym pakiecie nie ma wystarczającej ilości miejsca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2633">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool from which to allocate another packet if there is not enough room in the current packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2634">**WAIT_OPTION** Definiuje, w jaki sposób działa usługa, jeśli nie ma dostępnych pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2634">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2635">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2635">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2638">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0X00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2638">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2639">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego dołączenia do pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet append.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0X01) Brak dostępnego pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2642">Zażądane zawieszenie **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) zostało przerwane przez wywołanie tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2643">Rozmiar pakietu **NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) nie może obsługiwać protokołu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2644">Wskaźnik prefiksu **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) jest mniejszy niż początek ładunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) dołączany wskaźnik jest większy niż koniec ładunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowa Pula, pakiet lub wskaźnik danych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or data Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0X09) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar danych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid data size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowa opcja oczekiwania z niewątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2649">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2650">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze i procedury ISR (sterowniki sieciowe aplikacji)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2650">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2651">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2652">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2653">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2653">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Append "abcd" to the specified packet. */
status = nx_packet_data_append(packet_ptr, "abcd", 4, &pool_0, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the additional four bytes "abcd" have
   been appended to the packet. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_extract_offset"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2668">Wyodrębnij dane z pakietu za pośrednictwem przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2668">Extract data from packet via an offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2669">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2669">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_extract_offset(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG offset,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG buffer_length,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2670">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2670">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2671">Ta usługa kopiuje dane z pakietu NetX Duo (lub łańcucha pakietów), rozpoczynając od określonego przesunięcia od wskaźnika dołączania pakietu o określonym rozmiarze (w bajtach) do określonego buforu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2671">This service copies data from a NetX Duo packet (or packet chain) starting at the specified offset from the packet prepend pointer of the specified size in bytes into the specified buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2672">Liczba bajtów w rzeczywistości kopiowanych jest zwracana w *bytes_copied.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2672">The number of bytes actually copied is returned in *bytes_copied.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2673">Ta usługa nie usuwa danych z pakietu ani nie dostosowuje wskaźnika dołączania ani innych informacji o stanie wewnętrznym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2673">This service does not remove data from the packet, nor does it adjust the prepend pointer or other internal state information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2674">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2675">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik do pakietu do wyodrębnienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2675">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2676">**przesunięcie** Przesunięcie od bieżącego wskaźnika dołączania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2676">**offset** Offset from the current prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2677">**buffer_start** Wskaźnik do początku zapisu bufora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2677">**buffer_start** Pointer to start of save buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2678">**BUFFER_LENGTH** Liczba bajtów do skopiowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2678">**buffer_length** Number of bytes to copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2679">**bytes_copied** Liczba bajtów rzeczywiście skopiowanych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2679">**bytes_copied** Number of bytes actually copied</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2680">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2681">Pomyślna kopia pakietu **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) podano nieprawidłową wartość przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Invalid offset value was supplied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik pakietu lub wskaźnik buforu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer or buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2684">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2684">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2685">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze i procedury ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2685">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2686">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2686">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2687">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2687">No</span></span>

```c
/* Extract 10 bytes from the start of the received packet buffer
   into the specified memory area. */
status = nx_packet_data_extract_offset(my_packet, 0, &data[0], 10,
                                       &bytes_copied) ;
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, 10 bytes were successfully copied into
   the data buffer. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2698">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2698">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_data_retrieve"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2702">Pobieranie danych z pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2702">Retrieve data from packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2703">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_retrieve(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2704">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2705">Ta usługa kopiuje dane z dostarczonego pakietu do podanego buforu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2705">This service copies data from the supplied packet into the supplied buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2706">Rzeczywista liczba skopiowanych bajtów jest zwracana w miejscu docelowym wskazywanym przez **bytes_copied**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2706">The actual number of bytes copied is returned in the destination pointed to by **bytes_copied**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2707">Należy zauważyć, że ta usługa nie zmienia wewnętrznego stanu pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2707">Note that this service does not change internal state of the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2708">Pobierane dane są nadal dostępne w pakiecie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2708">The data being retrieved is still available in the packet.</span></span> 

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2709">*Bufor docelowy musi być wystarczająco duży, aby można było przechowywać zawartość pakietu. W przeciwnym razie pamięć zostanie uszkodzona, powodując nieprzewidywalne wyniki*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2709">*The destination buffer must be large enough to hold the packet's contents. If not, memory will be corrupted causing unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2710">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2710">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2711">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik na pakiet źródłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2711">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2712">**buffer_start** Wskaźnik na początek obszaru bufora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2712">**buffer_start** Pointer to the start of the buffer area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2713">**bytes_copied** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla liczby kopiowanych bajtów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2713">**bytes_copied** Pointer to the destination for the number of bytes copied.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2714">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobranie danych pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet data retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy pakiet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Invalid packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik skopiowanego pakietu, uruchomienia buforu lub bajtów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet, buffer start, or bytes copied pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2718">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2719">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze i procedury ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2719">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2720">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2720">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2721">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2721">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2722">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2722">Example</span></span>

```c
UCHAR                 buffer[512];
ULONG                 bytes_copied;

/* Retrieve data from packet pointed to by "packet_ptr". */
status = nx_packet_data_retrieve(packet_ptr, buffer, &bytes_copied);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, buffer contains the contents of the
   packet, the size of which is contained in "bytes_copied." */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2737">Pobierz długość danych pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2737">Get length of packet data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2738">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_length_get(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2739">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2740">Ta usługa Pobiera długość danych w określonym pakiecie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2741">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2741">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2743">**Długość** Wartość docelowa dla długości pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2743">**length** Destination for the packet length.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2744">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2744">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślna długość pakietu get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet length get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2748">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze i procedury ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2749">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2749">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2751">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2751">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the length of the data in "my_packet." */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, data length is in "my_length". */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2766">Utwórz pulę pakietów w określonym obszarze pamięci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2767">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2768">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2769">Ta usługa tworzy pulę pakietów o określonym rozmiarze pakietu w obszarze pamięci dostarczonym przez użytkownika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2770">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2771">**pool_ptr** Wskaźnik do bloku kontroli puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2772">**Nazwa** Wskaźnik do nazwy aplikacji dla puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2773">**payload_size** Liczba bajtów w każdym pakiecie w puli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2774">Ta wartość musi być równa co najmniej 40 bajtów i musi być również niewidoczna przez 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2775">**memory_ptr** Wskaźnik do obszaru pamięci, w którym ma zostać umieszczona Pula pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2776">Wskaźnik powinien być wyrównany na granicy ULONG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2777">**memory_size** Rozmiar obszaru pamięci puli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2778">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie utworzono pulę pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik puli lub pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0X09) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku lub pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2783">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2784">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2784">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2785">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2785">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2786">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2786">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2787">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2787">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a packet pool of 32000 bytes starting at physical
   address 0x10000000. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, "Default Pool", 128,
                               (void *) 0x10000000, 32000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   created. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2802">Usuń wcześniej utworzoną pulę pakietów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2802">Delete previously created packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2803">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2803">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT  nx_packet_pool_delete(NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2804">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2804">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2805">Ta usługa usuwa wcześniej utworzoną pulę pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2805">This service deletes a previously created packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2806">NetX Duo sprawdza wszystkie wątki aktualnie zawieszone w pakietach w puli pakietów i czyści zawieszenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2806">NetX Duo checks for any threads currently suspended on packets in the packet pool and clears the suspension.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2807">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2807">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2809">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne usunięcie puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik puli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2814">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2814">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2815">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2815">Preemption Possible</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2832">Pobieranie informacji o puli pakietów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2833">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2834">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2835">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o określonej puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2836">*Jeśli wskaźnik docelowy jest NX_NULL, to konkretne informacje nie są zwracane do obiektu wywołującego*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2837">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2838">**pool_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonej puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2839">**total_packets** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby pakietów w puli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2840">**free_packets** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby aktualnie bezpłatnych pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby żądań alokacji, gdy pula była pusta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby pustych zawieszeń puli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby nieprawidłowych wersji pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2844">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pobieranie informacji o puli pakietów powiodło się.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2848">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2849">Inicjalizacja, wątki i czasomierze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2850">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2851">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2852">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2867">Ustaw dolny limit puli pakietów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2867">Set packet pool low watermark</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2868">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2868">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG low_watermark);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2869">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2870">Ta usługa konfiguruje dolny limit dla określonej puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2871">Po ustawieniu wartości niskiego limitu protokół TCP lub UDP nie będzie kolejkować odebranych pakietów, jeśli liczba dostępnych pakietów w puli pakietów jest mniejsza niż Dolny znak wodny puli pakietów, co uniemożliwi puli pakietów Starved pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2872">Ta usługa jest dostępna, jeśli biblioteka NetX Duo została skompilowana z użyciem opcji ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** zdefiniowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2873">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2874">**pool_ptr** Wskaźnik do bloku kontroli puli pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2875">**low_watermark** Wartość dolnego limitu do skonfigurowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2876">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wartość dolnego limitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) funkcja dolnego limitu nie jest wbudowana w NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik puli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2881">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2882">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2883">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2884">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2885">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```

## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2900">Zwolnij wcześniej przydzieloną pakietów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2902">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2903">Ta usługa zwalnia pakiet, w tym wszystkie dodatkowe pakiety powiązane z określonym pakietem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2904">Jeśli inny wątek jest blokowany w alokacji pakietów, otrzymuje pakiet i został wznowiony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2905">*Aplikacja musi uniemożliwiać zwolnienie pakietu więcej niż raz, ponieważ takie działanie spowoduje nieprzewidywalne wyniki*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2906">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2907">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2908">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne wydanie pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2911">Wskaźnik prefiksu **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) jest mniejszy niż początek ładunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) dołączany wskaźnik jest większy niż koniec ładunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2913">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2914">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze i procedury ISR (sterowniki sieciowe aplikacji)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2914">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2915">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2915">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2916">Tak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2917">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2917">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet. */
status = nx_packet_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been returned to the
   packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2932">Zwolnij przesłany pakiet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2933">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2934">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2935">W przypadku pakietów innych niż TCP ta usługa zwalnia przesyłany pakiet, w tym wszystkie dodatkowe pakiety połączone z określonym pakietem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2936">Jeśli inny wątek jest blokowany w alokacji pakietów, otrzymuje pakiet i został wznowiony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2937">W przypadku przesyłanego pakietu TCP pakiet jest oznaczany jako przesyłany, ale nie jest uwalniany do momentu potwierdzenia pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2938">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana ze sterownika sieci aplikacji po przesłaniu pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2939">*Sterownik sieciowy powinien usunąć nagłówek nośnika fizycznego i dostosować długość pakietu przed wywołaniem tej usługi*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2940">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2941">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2942">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślna transmisja pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2945">Wskaźnik prefiksu **NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) jest mniejszy niż początek ładunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) dołączany wskaźnik jest większy niż koniec ładunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2947">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2948">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze, sterowniki sieciowe aplikacji (w tym procedury ISR)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2949">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2949">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2950">Tak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2950">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2951">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2951">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet that was just transmitted
   from the application network driver. */
status = nx_packet_transmit_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the transmitted packet has been
   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2966">Wyłącz protokół odwrotnego rozpoznawania adresów (RARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2966">Disable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2967">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2967">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2968">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2968">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2969">Ta usługa wyłącza składnik RARP programu NetX Duo dla określonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2969">This service disables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2970">W przypadku systemu wielodomowego ta usługa wyłącza RARP na wszystkich interfejsach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2970">For a multihome  system, this service disables RARP on all interfaces.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2971">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2971">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2972">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2972">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2973">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2973">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) POMYŚLNE wyłączenie RARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2975">Nie włączono **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) RARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP was not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2978">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2979">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2979">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2980">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2980">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2981">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2981">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2982">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2982">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is disabled. */
```
