## <a name="nx_rarp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2987">Włącz protokół odwrotnego rozpoznawania adresów (RARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2987">Enable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2988">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2989">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2990">Ta usługa włącza składnik RARP programu NetX Duo dla określonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2990">This service enables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2991">Składniki RARP przeszukują wszystkie podłączone interfejsy sieciowe dla zerowego adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2991">The RARP components searches through all attached network interfaces for zero IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2992">Zerowy adres IP wskazuje, że interfejs nie ma jeszcze przypisywania adresów IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2992">A zero IP address indicates the interface does not have IP address assignment yet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2993">RARP próbuje rozpoznać adres IP, włączając proces RARP w tym interfejsie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2993">RARP attempts to resolve the IP address by enabling RARP process on that interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2994">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2994">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2995">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2995">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2996">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) POMYŚLNE włączenie RARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2998">Adres IP **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) jest już prawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP address is already valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) RARP został już włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP was already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3002">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3003">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3003">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3004">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3004">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3005">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3005">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3006">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3006">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is enabled and is attempting to
   resolve this IP instance’s address by querying the network. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3011">Pobierz informacje o działaniach RARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3011">Retrieve information about RARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3012">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3012">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *rarp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *rarp_responses_received,
    ULONG *rarp_invalid_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3013">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3013">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3014">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o działaniach RARP dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3014">This service retrieves information about RARP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3015">*Jeśli wskaźnik docelowy jest NX_NULL, to konkretne informacje nie są zwracane do obiektu wywołującego*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3015">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3016">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3017">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3017">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby wysłanych żądań RARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP requests sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby odebranych odpowiedzi RARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby nieprawidłowych komunikatów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3021">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie RARP pobieranie informacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3026">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3027">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3027">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3028">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3028">Preemption Possible</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3075">Powiąż gniazdo TCP klienta z portem TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3075">Bind client TCP socket to TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3076">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3076">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3077">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3077">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3078">Ta usługa wiąże wcześniej utworzone gniazdo klienta TCP z określonym portem TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3078">This service binds the previously created TCP client socket to the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3079">Prawidłowy zakres TCP Sockets należy do zakresu od 0 do 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3079">Valid TCP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3080">Jeśli określony port TCP jest niedostępny, usługa zawiesza się zgodnie z podaną opcją oczekiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3080">If the specified TCP port is unavailable, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3081">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3082">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3082">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3083">Numer **portu portu** do powiązania (od 1 do 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3083">**port Port** number to bind (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3084">Jeśli numer portu to NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), wystąpienie protokołu IP wyszuka następny bezpłatny port i użyje go do powiązania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3084">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3085">**WAIT_OPTION** Definiuje, w jaki sposób działa usługa, jeśli port jest już powiązany z innym gniazdem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3085">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3086">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3086">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3089">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0X00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3089">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3090">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego powiązania gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0X22) to gniazdo jest już powiązane z innym portem TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another TCP port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3093">Port **NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) jest już powiązany z innym gniazdem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) brak wolnego portu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3095">Zażądane zawieszenie **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) zostało przerwane przez wywołanie tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) nieprawidłowy port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3100">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3101">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3102">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3102">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3103">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3103">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3104">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3104">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind a previously created client socket to port 12 and wait for 7
   timer ticks for the bind to complete. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(&client_socket, 12, 7);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created client_socket is
   bound to port 12 on the associated IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3129">Połącz gniazdo TCP klienta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3129">Connect client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3130">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3130">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3131">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3131">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3132">Ta usługa łączy poprzednio utworzone i powiązane gniazdo klienta TCP z portem określonego serwera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3132">This service connects the previously created and bound TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3133">Prawidłowe porty serwera TCP mieszczą się w zakresie od 0 do 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3133">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3134">Jeśli połączenie nie zakończy się natychmiast, usługa zawiesza się zgodnie z podaną opcją oczekiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3134">If the connection does not complete immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3135">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3136">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3136">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3137">**server_IP** Adres IP serwera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3137">**server_ip** Server’s IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3138">**SERVER_PORT** Numer portu serwera do połączenia \* \* (od 1 do 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3138">**server_port** Server port number to connect to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3139">**WAIT_OPTION** Definiuje sposób zachowania usługi podczas ustanawiania połączenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3139">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3140">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3140">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3143">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0X00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3143">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3144">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3144">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego nawiązania połączenia z gniazdem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3146">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) nie jest powiązane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3147">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) nie jest w stanie zamkniętym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0X37) nie określono oczekiwania, próba połączenia jest w toku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) podano nieprawidłowy interfejs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface supplied.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3150">Zażądane zawieszenie **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) zostało przerwane przez wywołanie tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP serwera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) nieprawidłowy port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3156">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3157">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3157">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3159">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3159">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3160">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3160">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initiate a TCP connection from a previously created and bound
   client socket. The connection requested in this example is to
   port 12 on the server with the IP address of 1.2.3.5. This
   service will wait 300 timer ticks for the connection to take
   place before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(&client_socket,
                                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                                      12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created and bound
   client_socket is connected to port 12 on IP 1.2.3.5. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3185">Pobieranie numeru portu powiązanego z gniazdem TCP klienta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3185">Get port number bound to client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3186">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3186">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3187">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3188">Ta usługa Pobiera numer portu skojarzony z gniazdem, który jest przydatny do znajdowania portu przydzielonego przez NetX Duo w sytuacjach, w których NX_ANY_PORT został określony w momencie powiązania gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3188">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3189">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3190">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3191">**port_ptr** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla numeru portu powrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3191">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3192">Prawidłowe numery portów to (od 1 do 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3192">Valid port numbers are (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3193">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3193">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego powiązania gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0X24) to gniazdo nie jest powiązane z portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda lub zwracany przez port wskaźnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3199">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3200">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3200">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3201">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3201">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3202">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3202">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3203">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3203">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of previously created and bound client
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(&client_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3229">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3229">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3230">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3231">Ta usługa zwalnia powiązanie między gniazdem klienta TCP i portem TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3231">This service releases the binding between the TCP client socket and a TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3232">Jeśli istnieją inne wątki oczekujące na powiązanie innego gniazda z tym samym numerem portu, pierwszy zawieszony wątek zostanie powiązany z tym portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3232">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the same port number, the first suspended thread is then bound to this port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3233">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3233">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3234">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3234">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3235">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3235">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) odpinanie gniazda zakończone powodzeniem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3237">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) nie zostało powiązane z żadnym portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3238">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) nie zostało odłączone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket has not been disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3243">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3243">Threads</span></span>

```c
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is no longer
   bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3271">Włącz składnik TCP elementu NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3271">Enable TCP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3272">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3272">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3273">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3274">Ta usługa włącza składnik Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3274">This service enables the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3275">Po włączeniu połączenia TCP mogą być nawiązywane przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3275">After enabled, TCP connections may be established by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3276">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3276">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3277">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3277">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3278">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne włączenie protokołu TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) TCP jest już włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3283">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3284">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3285">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3285">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3286">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3287">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable TCP on a previously created IP instance ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP is enabled on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3312">Znajdź następny dostępny port TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3312">Find next available TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3313">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3313">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3314">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3315">Ta usługa próbuje zlokalizować bezpłatny port TCP (niepowiązany), rozpoczynając od portu dostarczonego przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3315">This service attempts to locate a free TCP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3316">Logika wyszukiwania zostanie zawinięty, jeśli wyszukiwanie nastąpi do osiągnięcia maksymalnej wartości maksymalnego portu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3316">The search logic will wrap around if the search happens to reach the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3317">Jeśli wyszukiwanie zakończyło się pomyślnie, port wolny jest zwracany w zmiennej wskazywanej przez *free_port_ptr*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3317">If  the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by *free_port_ptr*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3318">*Ta usługa może być wywoływana z innego wątku i ma ten sam port. Aby uniknąć tego warunku wyścigu, aplikacja może chcieć umieścić tę usługę i rzeczywiste powiązanie gniazda klienta w ramach ochrony obiektu mutex*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3318">*This service can be called from another thread and have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual client socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3319">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3319">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3320">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3320">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3321">**port** Numer portu, aby rozpocząć wyszukiwanie (od 1 do 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3321">**port** Port number to start search at (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3322">**free_port_ptr** Wskaźnik na wartość zwrotną wolnego portu docelowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3323">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3323">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne znalezienie bezpłatnego portu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0X45) nie znaleziono wolnych portów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) określony numer portu jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) The specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free TCP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_tcp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, "free_port" contains the next free port
   on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3359">Pobierz informacje o działaniach TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3359">Retrieve information about TCP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3360">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3360">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_connections,
    ULONG *tcp_disconnections,
    ULONG *tcp_connections_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3361">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3361">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3362">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o działaniach TCP dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3362">This service retrieves information about TCP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3363">*Jeśli wskaźnik docelowy jest NX_NULL, to konkretne informacje nie są zwracane do obiektu wywołującego*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3363">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3364">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3364">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3365">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3365">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby wysłanych pakietów TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby wysłanych bajtów TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby odebranych pakietów TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby odebranych bajtów TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby nieprawidłowych pakietów TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid TCP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby porzuconych pakietów TCP odbioru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby pakietów TCP z błędami sumy kontrolnej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3373">**tcp_connections** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby połączeń TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3373">**tcp_connections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby odniesień protokołu TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP disconnections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby porzuconych połączeń TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby przesłanych pakietów TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets retransmitted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3377">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3377">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie informacji TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3382">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3382">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3383">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3383">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3384">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3384">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3385">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3385">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3386">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3386">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_info_get(&ip_0,
                         &tcp_packets_sent,
                         &tcp_bytes_sent,
                         &tcp_packets_received,
                         &tcp_bytes_received,
                         &tcp_invalid_packets,
                         &tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &tcp_checksum_errors,
                         &tcp_connections,
                         &tcp_disconnections
                         &tcp_connections_dropped,
                         &tcp_retransmit_packets);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_accept"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3411">Zaakceptuj połączenie TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3411">Accept TCP connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3412">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3412">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3413">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3414">Ta usługa akceptuje (lub przygotowuje do akceptowania) żądanie połączenia gniazda klienta TCP dla portu, który został wcześniej skonfigurowany do nasłuchiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3414">This service accepts (or prepares to accept) a TCP client socket connection request for a port that was previously set up for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3415">Ta usługa może być wywoływana natychmiast po wywołaniu przez aplikację nasłuchiwania lub ponownego nasłuchiwania albo gdy wywoływana jest procedura wywołania zwrotnego Listen, gdy połączenie z klientem jest rzeczywiście obecne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3415">This service may be called immediately after the application calls the listen or re-listen service or after the listen callback routine is called when the client connection is actually present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3416">Jeśli połączenie nie może być od razu ustanowione, usługa zawiesza się zgodnie z podaną opcją oczekiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3416">If a connection cannot not be established right away, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3417">*Aplikacja musi wywoływać **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** , gdy połączenie nie jest już potrzebne do usunięcia powiązania gniazda serwera z portem serwera*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3417">*The application must call **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** after the connection is no longer needed to remove the server socket's binding to the server port*.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3418">*Procedury wywołania zwrotnego aplikacji są wywoływane z wewnątrz wątku pomocnika IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3418">*Application callback routines are called from within the IP's helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3419">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3420">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania gniazda serwera TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3420">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP server socket control block.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3438">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3438">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
    /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
    tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
    /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
       example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
    /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
        initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the
        link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already been
        created
    */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket,
                         "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
       "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client and then disconnecting.*/
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
        request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
        if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

            /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
               message */
            nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                         NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
            nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                  sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                  &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

            /* Check for an error. */
            if (status)
            {
               /* Error, release the packet. */
               nx_packet_release(my_packet);
            }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_listen"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3463">Włącz nasłuchiwanie połączenia klienta na porcie TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3463">Enable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3464">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3464">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT listen_queue_size,
    VOID (*listen_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3465">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3465">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3466">Ta usługa umożliwia nasłuchiwanie żądania połączenia klienta na określonym porcie TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3466">This service enables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3467">Po odebraniu żądania połączenia z klientem podane gniazdo serwera jest powiązane z określonym portem i wywoływana funkcja wywołania zwrotnego nasłuchiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3467">When a client connection request is received, the supplied server socket is bound to the specified port and the supplied listen callback function is called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3468">Przetwarzanie procedury wywołania zwrotnego Listen jest całkowicie do aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3468">The listen callback routine's processing is completely up to the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3469">Może on zawierać logikę do wznowienia wątku aplikacji, który następnie wykonuje operację akceptacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3469">It may contain logic to wake up an application thread that subsequently performs an accept operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3470">Jeśli aplikacja ma już zawieszony wątek przy akceptowaniu przetwarzania dla tego gniazda, procedura wywołania zwrotnego odbiornika może nie być wymagana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3470">If the application already has a thread suspended on accept processing for this socket, the listen callback routine may not be needed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3471">Jeśli aplikacja chce obsługiwać dodatkowe połączenia klientów na tym samym porcie, ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** musi zostać wywołana z dostępnym gniazdem (gniazdo w stanie zamkniętym) dla następnego połączenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3471">If the application wishes to handle additional client connections on the same port, the ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** must be called with an available socket (a socket in the CLOSED state) for the next connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3472">Do momentu wywołania usługi ponownego nasłuchiwania dodatkowe połączenia klienckie są umieszczane w kolejce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3472">Until the re-listen service is called, additional client connections are queued.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3473">Po przekroczeniu maksymalnej głębokości kolejki żądanie najstarszego połączenia zostanie porzucone na rzecz kolejkowania nowego żądania połączenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3473">When the maximum queue depth is exceeded, the oldest connection request is dropped in favor of queuing the new connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3474">Maksymalna głębokość kolejki jest określona przez tę usługę.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3474">The maximum queue depth is specified by this service.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3475">*Procedury wywołania zwrotnego aplikacji są wywoływane z wątku pomocnika wewnętrznego adresu IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3475">*Application callback routines are called from the internal IP helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3476">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3477">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3477">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3478">**port** Numer portu, na którym nasłuchuje nasłuchiwanie (od 1 do 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3478">**port** Port number to listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3479">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do gniazda, który ma być używany w połączeniu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3479">**socket_ptr** Pointer to socket to use for the connection.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3480">**listen_queue_size** Liczba żądań połączenia klienta, które można umieścić w kolejce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3480">**listen_queue_size** Number of client connection requests that can be queued.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3481">**listen_callback** Funkcja aplikacji do wywołania po odebraniu połączenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3481">**listen_callback** Application function to call when the connection is received.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3482">Jeśli określono wartość NULL, funkcja wywołania zwrotnego Listen jest wyłączona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3482">If a NULL is specified, the listen callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3483">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3483">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne włączenie nasłuchiwania portu TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port listen enable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) dostarczony gniazdo serwera jest już powiązany z portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0X34) istnieje już aktywne żądanie nasłuchiwania dla tego portu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) There is already an active listen request for this port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) określono nieprawidłowy port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket.
   This example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
   /* Assuming that:
      "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
      initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created
      and the link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already
      been created.
   */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                        Socket",
                        NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                        NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                        NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
      each client and then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
           request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection
           to complete. */
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
           if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

              /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                 message. */
              nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                 NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

              /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
              nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                    sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                    &my_pool,
                                    NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {
                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }
         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
         again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);
     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3523">Ponowne nasłuchiwanie połączenia klienta na porcie TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3523">Re-listen for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3524">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3524">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3525">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3526">Ta usługa jest wywoływana po odebraniu połączenia na porcie, który został wcześniej skonfigurowany do nasłuchiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3526">This service is called after a connection has been received on a port that was setup previously for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3527">Głównym celem tej usługi jest udostępnienie nowego gniazda serwera dla następnego połączenia z klientem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3527">The main purpose of this service is to provide a new server socket for the next client connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3528">Jeśli żądanie połączenia jest kolejkowane, połączenie zostanie przetworzone natychmiast w trakcie tego wywołania usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3528">If a connection request is queued, the connection will be processed immediately during this service call.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3529">Ta *sama procedura wywołania zwrotnego określona przez oryginalne żądanie Listen jest również wywoływana, gdy istnieje połączenie dla tego nowego gniazda serwera*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3529">*The same callback routine specified by the original listen request is also called when a connection is present for this new server socket*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3530">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3531">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3531">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3532">**port** Numer portu do ponownego nasłuchiwania (od 1 do 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3532">**port** Port number to re-listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3533">**socket_ptr** Gniazdo do użycia dla następnego połączenia z klientem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket to use for the next client connection.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3534">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3534">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne ponowne nasłuchiwanie portu TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port re-listen.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) dostarczony gniazdo serwera nie jest w stanie zamkniętym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) dostarczony gniazdo serwera jest już powiązany z portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0X47) istnieje już prawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda dla tego portu lub określony port nie ma aktywnego żądania listen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) There is already a valid socket pointer for this port or the port specified does not have a listen request active.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0X48) taka sama jak NX_SUCCESS, z wyjątkiem tego, że wystąpiło żądanie połączenia w kolejce i zostało przetworzone w trakcie tego wywołania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) Same as NX_SUCCESS, except there was a queued connection request and it was processed during this call.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) określono nieprawidłowy port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wywołania zwrotnego adresu IP lub nasłuchiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or listen callback pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3548">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3548">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
      example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial
     count of 0.
    "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled.
    "my_pool" packet pool has already been created. */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                                 NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                                 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                                 NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

       /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
          request is present. */
       tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

       /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
          complete. */
       status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                   &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is
            called even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3575">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3575">Description</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-3590">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-3590">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL        my_pool;
NX_IP                 my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET         server_socket;
void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
   doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET  *my_packet;
UINT       status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
      of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
     "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
   */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                         Socket",NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                         NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,NX_NULL,
                         port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye"
       to
       each client and then disconnecting. */
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request
           is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {
             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet,
                      "Hello_and_Goodbye",sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                      &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
       }

       /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even
          if disconnect or accept fails. */
       nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

      /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
      nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
    }

    /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

    /* Delete the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```
