## <a name="nx_udp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4804">Utwórz gniazdo UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4804">Create UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4805">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4805">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG queue_maximum);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4806">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4806">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4807">Ta usługa tworzy gniazdo UDP dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4807">This service creates a UDP socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4808">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4808">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4809">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4809">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4810">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do nowej kontrolki gniazda UDP blo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4810">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new UDP socket control bloc.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4811">**Nazwa** Nazwa aplikacji dla tego gniazda UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4811">**name** Application name for this UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4812">**Type_of_Service** Definiuje typ usługi do transmisji, wartości prawne są następujące:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4812">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4818">**fragment określa** , czy jest dozwolone fragmentacja adresów IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4818">**fragment Specifies** whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4819">Jeśli określono NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0), jest dozwolone fragmentacja adresów IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4819">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4820">Jeśli określono NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000), fragmentacja adresów IP jest wyłączona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4820">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4821">**time_to_live** Określa 8-bitową wartość, która definiuje liczbę routerów, które ten pakiet może przekazać przed wyrzucaniem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4821">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4822">Wartość domyślna jest określana przez NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4822">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4823">**queue_maximum** Określa maksymalną liczbę datagramów UDP, która może być umieszczona w kolejce dla tego gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4823">**queue_maximum** Defines the maximum number of UDP datagrams that can be queued for this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4824">Po osiągnięciu limitu kolejki dla każdego nowego pakietu odebrano najstarszy pakiet UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4824">After the queue limit is reached, for every new packet received the oldest UDP packet is released.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4825">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4825">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie utworzono gniazdo UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) Nieprawidłowy typ usługi, fragmentu lub opcji Time-to-Live.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, or time-to-live option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4831">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4831">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4832">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4832">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4833">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4833">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4834">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4834">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4835">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4835">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a UDP socket with a maximum receive queue of 30 packets.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_create(&ip_0, &udp_socket, "Sample UDP Socket",
                              NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY, 0x80,
                              30);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the new UDP socket has been created and
   is ready for binding. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4859">Usuń gniazdo UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4859">Delete UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4860">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4860">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_delete(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4861">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4862">Ta usługa usuwa wcześniej utworzone gniazdo UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4862">This service deletes a previously created UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4863">Jeśli gniazdo zostało powiązane z portem, gniazdo musi być najpierw niepowiązane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4863">If the socket was bound to a port, the socket must be unbound first.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4864">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4864">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4865">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4865">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4866">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4866">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne usunięcie gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4868">Gniazdo **NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) jest nadal powiązane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4872">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4872">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4873">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4873">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4874">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4874">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4875">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4875">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4876">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4876">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created UDP socket. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created UDP socket has
   been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4900">Pobierz informacje o działaniach gniazda UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4900">Retrieve information about UDP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_info_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4902">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4903">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o działaniach gniazda UDP dla określonego wystąpienia gniazda UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4903">This service retrieves information about UDP socket activities for the specified UDP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4904">*Jeśli wskaźnik docelowy jest NX_NULL, to konkretne informacje nie są zwracane do obiektu wywołującego*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4904">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4905">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4906">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4906">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby pakietów UDP wysłanych w gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla łącznej liczby bajtów UDP wysłanych w gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4909">**udp_packets_received** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego całkowitej liczby pakietów UDP odebranych w gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4909">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby bajtów UDP odebranych w gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby pakietów UDP umieszczonych w kolejce w gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued UDP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej łącznej liczby pakietów odbioru protokołu UDP porzuconych dla gniazda z powodu przekroczenia rozmiaru kolejki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped for socket due to queue size being exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Wskaźnik do lokalizacji docelowej całkowitej liczby pakietów UDP z błędami sumy kontrolnej w gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4914">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4914">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobranie informacji o gnieździe UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP socket information from socket 0.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &udp_packets_sent,
                                &udp_bytes_sent,
                                &udp_packets_received,
                                &udp_bytes_received,
                                &udp_queued_packets,
                                &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                                &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP socket information was retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4947">Wybierz numer portu powiązany z gniazdem UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4947">Pick up port number bound to UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4948">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4948">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_port_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4949">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4949">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4950">Ta usługa Pobiera numer portu skojarzony z gniazdem, który jest przydatny do znajdowania portu przydzielonego przez NetX Duo w sytuacjach, w których NX_ANY_PORT został określony w momencie powiązania gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4950">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4951">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4952">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4952">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4953">**port_ptr** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla numeru portu powrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4953">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4954">Prawidłowe numery portów to (1-0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4954">Valid port numbers are (1- 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4955">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4955">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego powiązania gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0X24) to gniazdo nie jest powiązane z portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda lub zwracany przez port wskaźnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4961">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4961">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4962">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4962">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4963">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4963">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4964">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4964">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4965">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4965">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of created and bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_port_get(&udp_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4989">Odbieranie datagramu z gniazda UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4989">Receive datagram from UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4990">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4991">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4992">Ta usługa odbiera datagram UDP od określonego gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4992">This service receives an UDP datagram from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4993">Jeśli żaden datagram nie jest umieszczony w określonym gnieździe, obiekt wywołujący zawiesza się na podstawie podanej opcji oczekiwania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4993">If no datagram is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4994">*Jeśli NX_SUCCESS jest zwracana, aplikacja jest odpowiedzialna za zwolnienie odebranego pakietu, gdy nie jest już potrzebne*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4994">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4995">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4995">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4996">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4996">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4997">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik na wskaźnik pakietu datagramu UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4997">**packet_ptr** Pointer to UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4998">**WAIT_OPTION** Definiuje, w jaki sposób działa usługa, jeśli datagram nie jest obecnie umieszczony w tym gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4998">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if a datagram is not currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-4999">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-4999">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5002">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0X00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5002">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5003">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5003">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) odbieranie w gnieździe zakończone powodzeniem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5005">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) nie zostało powiązane z żadnym portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) brak datagramu UDP do odebrania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) There was no UDP datagram to receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5007">Zażądane zawieszenie **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) zostało przerwane przez wywołanie tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik powrotu gniazda lub pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5011">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5012">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5012">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5014">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5014">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5015">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5015">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from a previously created and bound UDP socket.
   If no packets are currently available, wait for 500 timer ticks
   before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive(&udp_socket, &packet_ptr, 500);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received UDP packet is pointed to by
   packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5039">Powiadamiaj aplikację o każdym odebranym pakiecie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5039">Notify application of each received packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5040">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5040">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*udp_receive_notify)(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5041">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5041">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5042">Ta usługa ustawia wskaźnik funkcji Odbierz powiadomienie na funkcję wywołania zwrotnego określonego przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5042">This service sets the receive notify function pointer to the callback function specified by the  application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5043">Ta funkcja wywołania zwrotnego jest wywoływana za każdym razem, gdy pakiet jest odbierany w gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5043">This callback function is then called whenever a packet is received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5044">Jeśli zostanie dostarczony NX_NULL wskaźnik, funkcja Odbierz powiadomienie jest wyłączona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5044">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the receive notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5045">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5046">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik na gniazdo UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5046">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Wskaźnik funkcji wywołania zwrotnego aplikacji, który jest wywoływany, gdy pakiet jest odbierany w gnieździe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when a packet is received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5048">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5048">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił funkcję powiadamiania odbioru gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set socket receive notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5051">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5052">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze i procedury ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5052">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5053">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5053">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5054">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5054">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5055">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5055">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "udp_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(&udp_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever a packet is received for
   "udp_socket". */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5075">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5075">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5079">Wysyłanie datagramu UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5079">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5080">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5080">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5081">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5082">Ta usługa wysyła datagram UDP za pomocą poprzednio utworzonego i powiązanego gniazda UDP dla sieci IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5082">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for IPv4 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5083">NetX Duo znajduje odpowiedni lokalny adres IP jako adres źródłowy na podstawie docelowego adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5083">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5084">Aby określić konkretny interfejs i źródłowy adres IP, aplikacja powinna używać usługi  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5084">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5085">Należy zauważyć, że ta usługa wraca natychmiast niezależnie od tego, czy datagram UDP został pomyślnie wysłany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5085">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5086">Odpowiednik usługi NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) jest ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5086">The NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) equivalent service is ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5087">Gniazdo musi być powiązane z portem lokalnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5087">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5088">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5089">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5089">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5090">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik pakietu datagramu UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5090">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5091">**IP_address** Docelowy adres IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5091">**ip_address** Destination IPv4 address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5093">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5093">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0X02) nie ma wystarczającej ilości miejsca na nagłówek UDP w pakiecie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5099">Wskaźnik dołączania pakietu **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5102">Nie włączono protokołu UDP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5103">Numer portu **NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) nie należy do prawidłowego zakresu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5108">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5108">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IP address. */
server_address = IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5);

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nx_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                            server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the application successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to its peer. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5132">Wyślij datagram za poorednictwem gniazda UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5132">Send datagram through UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5133">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5133">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    UINT port,
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5134">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5135">Ta usługa wysyła datagram UDP przy użyciu wcześniej utworzonego i powiązanego gniazda UDP za pomocą interfejsu sieciowego z określonym adresem IP jako adresem źródłowym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5135">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket through the network interface with the specified IP address as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5136">Należy pamiętać, że usługa wraca natychmiast, niezależnie od tego, czy datagram UDP został pomyślnie wysłany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5136">Note that service returns immediately, regardless of whether or not the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** działa zarówno dla sieci IPv4, jak i IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** works for both IPv4 and IPv6 networks.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5138">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5138">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5139">**socket_ptr** Gniazdo umożliwiające przesłanie pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket to transmit the packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5140">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik do pakietu do przesłania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5140">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5141">**IP_address** Docelowy adres IP do wysłania pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5141">**ip_address** Destination IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5142">**port** Port docelowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5142">**port** Destination port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5143">**address_index** Indeks adresu skojarzonego z interfejsem, na którym ma zostać wysłany pakiet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5143">**address_index** Index of the address associated with the interface to send packet on.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5144">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5144">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5145">Pomyślnie wysłano pakiet **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5146">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) nie jest powiązane z portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5148">Nie włączono przetwarzania UDP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik dołączania pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0X02) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik dołączania do pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) Nieprawidłowy indeks adresu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid address index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) numer portu przekracza maksymalny numer portu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number exceeds maximum port number.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5155">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5156">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5156">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5157">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5157">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5158">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5158">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5159">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5159">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_INDEX 1

/* Send packet out on port 80 to the specified destination IP on the
   interface at index 1 in the IP task interface list. */
status = nx_udp_socket_source_send(socket_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                   destination_ip, 80,
                                   ADDRESS_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet was successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5183">Usuń powiązanie gniazda UDP z portu UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5183">Unbind UDP socket from UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5184">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5184">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_unbind(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5185">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5185">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5186">Ta usługa zwalnia powiązanie między gniazdem UDP i portem UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5186">This service releases the binding between the UDP socket and a UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5187">Wszystkie odebrane pakiety przechowywane w kolejce odbierania zostaną wydane jako część operacji usuwania powiązania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5187">Any received packets stored in the receive queue are released as part of the unbind operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5188">Jeśli istnieją inne wątki oczekujące na powiązanie innego gniazda z niezwiązanym portem, pierwszy zawieszony wątek zostaje następnie powiązany z nowym niezwiązanym portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5188">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the unbound port, the first suspended thread is then bound to the newly unbound port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5189">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5190">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia gniazda UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5191">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5191">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) odpinanie gniazda zakończone powodzeniem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5193">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) nie zostało powiązane z żadnym portem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) ten składnik nie został włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5197">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5198">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5198">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5199">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5199">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5200">Tak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5200">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5201">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5201">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind the previously bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_unbind(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously bound socket is now
   unbound. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5225">Wyodrębnij adres IP i Wyślij port z datadatagramu UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5225">Extract IP and sending port from UDP datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5226">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5227">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5228">Ta usługa wyodrębnia adres IP i numer portu nadawcy z nagłówków IP i UDP dostarczonego datagramu UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5228">This service extracts the sender's IP and port number from the IP and UDP headers of the supplied UDP datagram.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5229">Należy pamiętać, że usługa ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** współpracuje z pakietami z sieci IPv4 lub IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5229">Note that the service ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** works with packets from either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5230">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5231">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik pakietu datagramu UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5232">**IP_address** Prawidłowy wskaźnik do zmiennej zwracanego adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5232">**ip_address** Valid pointer to the return IP address variable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5233">**port** Prawidłowy wskaźnik do zmiennej portu powrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5233">**port** Valid pointer to the return port variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5234">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5234">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne oddzielenie adresu IP/portu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source IP/port extraction.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) podany pakiet jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) The supplied packet is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowy pakiet lub adres IP lub port docelowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet or IP or port destination.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5238">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5238">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5239">Inicjalizacja, wątki, czasomierze, ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5239">Initialization, threads, timers, ISR</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5240">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5240">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5241">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5242">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract the IP and port information from the sender of the UPD packet. */
status = nx_udp_source_extract(packet_ptr, &sender_ip_address, &sender_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the sender IP and port information has been stored
   in sender_ip_address and sender_port respectively.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5266">Włączanie usług ICMPv4 i ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5266">Enable ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5267">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5267">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5268">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5268">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5269">Ta usługa włącza zarówno usługi ICMPv4, jak i ICMPv6 i może być wywoływana tylko po utworzeniu wystąpienia adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5269">This service enables both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services and can only be called after the IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5270">Usługę można włączyć albo przed lub po włączeniu protokołu IPv6 (zobacz *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5270">The service can be enabled either before or after IPv6 is enabled (see *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5271">Usługi ICMPv4 obejmują żądanie echa/odpowiedź.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5271">ICMPv4 services include Echo Request/Reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5272">Usługi ICMPv6 obejmują żądanie echa/odpowiedź, odnajdywanie sąsiadów, wykrywanie zduplikowanych adresów, odnajdywanie routera i Autokonfiguracja adresu bezstanowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5272">ICMPv6 services include Echo Request/Reply, Neighbor Discovery, Duplicate Address Detection, Router Discovery, and Stateless Address Auto-configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5273">Odpowiednik protokołu IPv4 w NetX jest *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5273">The IPv4 equivalent in NetX is *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

> [!NOTE] 
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5274">*Jeśli adres IPv6 został ręcznie skonfigurowany przed włączeniem protokołu ICMPv6, ręcznie skonfigurowany protokół IPv6 nie podlega procesowi wykrywania zduplikowanych adresów*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5274">*If the IPv6 address is manually configured prior to enabling ICMPv6, the manually configured IPv6 is not subject to Duplicate Address Detection process*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* uruchamia usługi ICMP tylko dla operacji IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* starts ICMP services for IPv4 operations only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5276">Aplikacje korzystające z usług ICMPv6 muszą używać *nxd_icmp_enable* zamiast *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5276">Applications using ICMPv6 services must use *nxd_icmp_enable* instead of *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5277">Aby można było użyć żądania routera IPv6 i bezstanowej automatycznej konfiguracji protokołu IPv6, należy włączyć protokół ICMPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5277">To utilize IPv6 router solicitation and IPv6 stateless auto-address configuration, ICMPv6 must be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5278">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5278">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5279">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5279">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5280">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5280">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) usługi ICMP zostały pomyślnie włączone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP services are successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5297">Wykonywanie żądań echa ICMPv4 lub ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5297">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5298">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5298">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr, 
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5299">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5299">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5300">Ta usługa wysyła pakiet żądania echa ICMP za pośrednictwem odpowiedniego interfejsu fizycznego i czeka na odpowiedź ECHA z hosta docelowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5300">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet through an appropriate physical interface and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5301">NetX Duo określa odpowiedni interfejs na podstawie adresu docelowego, aby wysłać wiadomość ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5301">NetX Duo determines the appropriate interface, based on the destination address, to send the ping message .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5302">Aplikacje używają ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** usługi, aby określić interfejs fizyczny i dokładny źródłowy adres IP, który ma być używany na potrzeby przesyłania pakietów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5302">Applications shall use the service ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** to specify the physical interface and precise source IP address to use for packet transmission.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5303">Należy utworzyć wystąpienie protokołu IP, a usługi ICMPv4/ICMPv6 muszą być włączone (zobacz ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5303">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4/ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5304">Jeśli NX_SUCCESS jest zwracana, aplikacja jest odpowiedzialna za zwolnienie odebranego pakietu, gdy nie jest już potrzebne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5304">If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5306">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5306">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5307">**IP_address** Docelowy adres IP do ping w kolejności bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5307">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5308">**data_ptr** Wskaźnik do polecenia ping dla obszaru danych pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5308">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5309">**data_size** Liczba bajtów danych ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5309">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5310">**response_ptr** Wskaźnik do odpowiedzi na wskaźnik pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5310">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet Pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5311">**WAIT_OPTION** Czas oczekiwania na odpowiedź.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5311">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5312">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5312">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5314">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0x00000001 przez</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5314">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5316">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie wysłano i otrzymano polecenie ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) protokół IPv6 nie jest włączony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5319">Dane ping **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) przekraczają ładunek pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5320">Host docelowy **NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) nie odpowiedział</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0X1A) żądanie zawieszenia zostało przerwane przez tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) nie można znaleźć odpowiedniego interfejsu wychodzącego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub odpowiedzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) nie włączono składnika IP lub protokołu ICMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP or ICMP component is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) wejściowy adres IP jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Input IP address is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5327">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5327">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5331">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5331">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send
   ping packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   2001:1234:5678::1 */
   
/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr,
                       NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been
   received from IP address 2001:1234:5678::1 and the response
   packet is contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr.It
   should have the same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4[0]    = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr, 10);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received
   from IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in
   the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same
   “abcd” four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_source_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5340">Wykonywanie żądań echa ICMPv4 lub ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5340">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5341">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_source_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT address_index,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5342">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5343">Ta usługa wysyła pakiet żądania echa protokołu ICMP przy użyciu określonego indeksu adresu IPv4 lub IPv6 oraz za pośrednictwem interfejsu sieciowego, z którym jest skojarzony adres źródłowy, i czeka na odpowiedź ECHA z hosta docelowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5343">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet using the specified index of an IPv4 or IPv6 address, and through the network interface the source address is associated with, and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5344">Ta usługa działa z adresami IPv4 i IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5344">This service works with both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5345">Parametr *address_index* wskazuje źródłowy adres IPv4 lub IPv6 do użycia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5345">The parameter *address_index* indicates the source IPv4 or IPv6 address to use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5346">W przypadku adresu IPv4 *address_index* jest tym samym indeksem do dołączonego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5346">For IPv4 address, the *address_index* is the same index to the attached network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5347">W przypadku protokołu IPv6 *address_index* wskazuje wpis w tabeli adresów IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5347">For IPv6, the *address_index* indicates the entry in the IPv6 address table.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5348">Należy utworzyć wystąpienie protokołu IP, a usługi ICMPv4 i ICMPv6 muszą być włączone (zobacz *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5348">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span></span>

> [!CAUTION] 
> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5349">*Jeśli NX_SUCCESS jest zwracana, aplikacja jest odpowiedzialna za zwolnienie odebranego pakietu, gdy nie jest już potrzebne*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5349">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5350">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5350">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5351">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5351">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5352">**IP_address** Docelowy adres IP do ping w kolejności bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5352">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5353">**address_index** Wskazuje adres IP, który ma być używany jako adres źródłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5353">**address_index** Indicates the IP address to use as source address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5354">**data_ptr** Wskaźnik do polecenia ping dla obszaru danych pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5354">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5355">**data_size** Liczba bajtów danych ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5355">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5356">**response_ptr** Wskaźnik do odpowiedzi na wskaźnik pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5356">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5357">**WAIT_OPTION** Czas oczekiwania na odpowiedź.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5357">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5358">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5358">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5359">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5359">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5360">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0X00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5360">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5361">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5361">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5362">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5362">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie wysłano i otrzymano polecenie ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5364">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) protokół IPv6 nie jest włączony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5364">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5377">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5377">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send ping
   packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 */

/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
#define GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS 1

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0xFE800000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x00000000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0x04117B23;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 0x40DCF181;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been received
   from IP address FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 and the response packet is
   contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the
   same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4       = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received from
   IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in the packet
   pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same “abcd” four bytes
   of data. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5403">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5403">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID icmpv6_ra_flag_callback(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT ra_flag)
{
   /* RA flag has changed. The updated value is passed in via the
      ra_flag parameter. */
}

/* Configure the user-defined ICMPv6 RA flag change callback
   function. */
status = nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set(&ip_0,
                                         icmpv6_ra_flag_callback);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the callback function has
   been successfully configured. */
```
