## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5412">Wyślij pakiet Raw IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5412">Send Raw IP Packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5413">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination
    ULONG protocol, 
    UINT ttl, 
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5414">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5415">Ta usługa wysyła nieprzetworzony pakiet IPv4 lub IPv6 (bez nagłówków protokołu warstwy transportu).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5415">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet (no transport-layer protocol headers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5416">Jeśli system nie może określić odpowiedniego interfejsu w systemie wielosystemowym (na przykład jeśli docelowy adres IP to adres IPv4 emisji, Multiemisja lub IPv6), urządzenie podstawowe jest zaznaczone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5416">On a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address), the primary device is selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5417">Usługa \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ może służyć do określania interfejsu wychodzącego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5417">The service \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ can be used to specify an outgoing interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5418">Odpowiednik NetX jest _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5418">The NetX equivalent is _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5419">Należy wcześniej utworzyć wystąpienie protokołu IP, a obsługa pakietów pierwotnych adresów IP musi być włączona za pomocą usługi ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5419">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5420">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5421">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5422">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik do pakietu do przesłania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5422">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5423">**destination_ip** Wskaźnik na adres docelowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5423">**destination_ip** Pointer to destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5424">**Protokół** Protokół pakietu przechowywany w nagłówku protokołu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5424">**protocol** Packet protocol stored to the IP header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5425">**czas wygaśnięcia** Wartość dla limitu czasu wygaśnięcia lub przeskoku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5425">**ttl** Value for TTL or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5426">**OT** Wartość dla OT lub klasy ruchu i etykiety przepływu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5426">**tos** Value for TOS or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5427">Wartość zwracana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5427">Return Value</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pierwotny pakiet protokołu IP został pomyślnie wysłany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Raw IP packet successfully sent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) nie można znaleźć odpowiedniego interfejsu wychodzącego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5430">Niewłączona obsługa pierwotnych adresów IP **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP handling not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IPv4 lub IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0X02) nie ma wystarczającej ilości miejsca dla nagłówka IPv4 lub IPv6 w pakiecie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5433">Wskaźnik dołączania pakietu **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP lub wskaźnika pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) nieprawidłowe dane wejściowe adresu IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5437">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5437">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5438">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5438">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5439">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5439">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5440">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5440">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5441">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5441">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS dest_address;

/* Set the destination address,in this case an IPv6 address. */
dest_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

UINT ttl, tos;

ttl = 128;

tos = 0;

/* Enable RAW IP handling on the previously created IP instance.*/
status = nx_raw_ip_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* Allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr from the IP packet
   pool. */
/* Then transmit the packet to the destination address. */

status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr, dest_address,
                                NX_PROTOCOL_UDP, ttl, tos);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet was
   successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5452">Wyślij pakiet pierwotny przy użyciu określonego adresu źródłowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5452">Send raw packet using specified source address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5453">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5453">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG protocol,
    UINT ttl,
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5454">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5454">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5455">Ta usługa wysyła nieprzetworzony pakiet IPv4 lub IPv6 przy użyciu określonego adresu IPv4 lub IPv6 jako adresu źródłowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5455">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet using the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address as source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5456">Ta usługa jest zwykle używana w systemie wielosystemowym, jeśli system nie może określić odpowiedniego interfejsu (na przykład jeśli docelowy adres IP to adres IPv4 emisji, multiemisji lub multiemisji IPv6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5456">This service is typically used on a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5457">Parametr *address_index* umożliwia aplikacji określenie adresu źródłowego do użycia podczas wysyłania tego pierwotnego pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5457">The parameter *address_index* allows the application to specify the source address to use when sending this raw packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5458">Należy wcześniej utworzyć wystąpienie protokołu IP, a obsługa pakietów pierwotnych adresów IP musi być włączona za pomocą usługi ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5458">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5459">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5460">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5460">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5461">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik do pakietu do wysłania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5461">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5462">**destination_ip** Docelowy adres IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5462">**destination_ip** Destination IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5463">**address_index** Indeks adresów IPv4 lub IPv6, które mają być używane jako adresy źródłowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5463">**address_index** Index to the IPv4 or IPv6 addresses to use as source address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5464">**Protokół** Wartość pola protokół</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5464">**protocol** Value for the protocol field</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5465">**czas wygaśnięcia** Wartość dla limitu czasu wygaśnięcia lub przeskoku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5465">**ttl** Value for ttl or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5466">**OT** Wartość dla OT lub klasy ruchu i etykiety przepływu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5466">**tos** Value for tos or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5467">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5467">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5468">Pomyślnie wysłano pakiet **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5468">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet is sent successfully</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0X02) nie ma wystarczającej ilości miejsca dla nagłówka IPv4 lub IPv6 w pakiecie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5470">Wskaźnik dołączania pakietu **NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik do bloku kontroli IP, pakietu lub destination_ip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP control block, packet, or destination_ip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5473">Przetwarzanie nieprzetworzone **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) nie jest włączone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw processing not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5474">Błąd adresu **NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Address error</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) Nieprawidłowy indeks interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) nieprawidłowe dane wejściowe adresu IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5477">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5477">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5478">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5478">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5479">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5479">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5480">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5480">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5481">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5481">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX 2

/* Send a raw packet from specified interface. */
status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                                       dest_ip,
                                       SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                       NX_IP_RAW,
                                       NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE,
                                       NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, raw packet has been sent out on the
   specified interface. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5492">Ustaw powiadomienie o zmianie adresu IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5492">Set ipv6 address change notify</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5493">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5493">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*ip_address_change_notify)(NX_IP *, UINT, UINT, UINT, ULONG *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5494">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5495">Ta usługa rejestruje procedurę wywołania zwrotnego aplikacji, która NetX Duo w przypadku zmiany adresu IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5495">This service registers an application callback routine that NetX Duo calls whenever the IPv6 Address is changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5496">Ta usługa jest dostępna, jeśli NetX Duo jest skompilowana, opcja ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** zdefiniowana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5496">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built is the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5497">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5497">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5498">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5498">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Funkcja wywołania zwrotnego aplikacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Application callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5500">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5500">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5501">Pomyślne ustawienie **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5501">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5502">Funkcja powiadamiania o zmianie adresu IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 address change notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5505">Powiadomienie o zmianie adresu IPv6 **NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) nie jest kompilowane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5505">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IPv6 address change notify is not compiled</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5506">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5507">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5507">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5508">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5509">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5510">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5510">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID ip_address_change_notify(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT status,
                              UINT interface_index,
                              UINT address_index,
                              ULONG *ip_address)
{

   /* Do something when ip address changed. */
}

void ip_address_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

   /* Set the ip address change notify of IP instance. */
   status = nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify (&ip_0, ip_address_change_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the ip address change notify of IP
   instance was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5536">Usuń adres IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5536">Delete IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5538">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5539">Ta usługa usuwa adres IPv6 o określonym indeksie w tabeli adresów IPv6 określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5539">This service deletes the IPv6 address at the specified index in the IPv6 address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5540">Nie istnieje odpowiednik NetX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5540">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5541">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5541">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5542">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5542">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5543">**address_index** Indeksowanie tabeli adresów IPv6 wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5543">**address_index** Index to IP instance IPv6 address table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5544">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5545">Pomyślnie usunięto adres **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Address successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5546">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotece NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) nie można znaleźć odpowiedniego interfejsu wychodzącego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5550">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5551">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5551">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5552">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5553">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5554">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5554">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;

/* Delete the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. */
address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_delete(&ip_0, address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5580">Pobieranie adresu IPv6 i prefiksu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5580">Retrieve IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5581">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5581">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5582">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5583">Ta usługa Pobiera adres IPv6 i prefiks o określonym indeksie w tabeli adresów określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5583">This service retrieves the IPv6 address and prefix at the specified index in the address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5584">Indeks interfejsu fizycznego, z którym skojarzony jest adres IPv6, jest zwracany na *interface_index* wskaźniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5584">The index of the physical interface the IPv6 address is associated with is returned in the *interface_index* pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5585">NetX równoważne usługi są \***nx_ip_address_get** _ i _ *_nx_ip_interface_address_get_* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5585">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_get** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5586">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5586">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5587">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5587">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5588">**address_index** Indeksowanie tabeli adresów IP wystąpień</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5588">**address_index** Index to IP instance address table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5589">**IP_address** Wskaźnik na adres, który ma zostać ustawiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5589">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5590">**PREFIX_LENGTH** Długość prefiksu adresu (Maska podsieci)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5590">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5591">**interface_index** Wskaźnik do indeksu interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5591">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the interface</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5592">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5592">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) protokół IPv6 został pomyślnie włączony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5594">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0X50) brak adresu interfejsu lub nieprawidłowy address_index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No interface address, or invalid address_index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5598">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5598">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5599">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5599">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5600">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5600">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5601">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5601">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5602">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5602">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
ULONG       prefix_length;
UINT        interface_index;

/* Get the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. If
   found, the address network interface is returned in the
   interface_index input, as well as the address prefix in the
   prefix_length input. */

address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_get(&ip_0, address_index, &ip_address,
                              &prefix_length, &interface_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully retrieved. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5629">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5629">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG prefix_length,
    UINT *address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5630">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5630">Description</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5653">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5653">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
UINT        interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                     IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                     0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                     pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* Set the IPv6 address (a global address as indicated by the 64 bit
   prefix) using the IPv6 address just created on the primary device
   (index zero). The index into the address table is returned in
   address_index. */
interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&ip_0, interface_index, &ip_address,
                              64,&address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IPv6 address is
   successfully assigned to the primary interface (interface 0). */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5679">Dodawanie routera IPv6 do tabeli routera domyślnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5679">Add an IPv6 Router to Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5680">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5680">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG router_lifetime,
    UINT index_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5681">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5682">Ta usługa dodaje domyślny router IPv6 w określonym interfejsie fizycznym do tabeli routera domyślnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5682">This service adds an IPv6 default router on the specified physical interface to the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5683">Równoważna usługa NetX IPv4 jest ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5683">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5684">*router_address* musi wskazywać prawidłowy adres IPv6, a router musi być bezpośrednio dostępny w określonym interfejsie fizycznym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5684">*router_address* must point to a valid IPv6 address, and the router must be directly accessible from the specified physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5685">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5686">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5686">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5687">**router_address** Wskaźnik do domyślnego adresu routera w kolejności bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5687">**router_address** Pointer to the default router address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5688">**router_lifetime** Domyślny czas trwania routera (w sekundach).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5688">**router_lifetime** Default router life time, in seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5689">Prawidłowe wartości:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5689">Valid values are:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5690">**0xFFFF:** Bez limitu czasu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5690">**0xFFFF:** No time out</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5691">**0 — 0xFFFE:** Wartość limitu czasu (w sekundach)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Timeout value, in seconds</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5692">**index_index** Wskaźnik do prawidłowej lokalizacji pamięci dla indeksu indeksu sieci, za pomocą którego można uzyskać dostęp do routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5692">**index_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the network index index through which the router can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5693">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5693">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Router domyślny został pomyślnie dodany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) nie ma więcej wpisów dostępnych w domyślnej tabeli routerów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries available in the default router table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5697">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) nieprawidłowe dane wejściowe adresu IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe wystąpienie adresu IP lub miejsce do magazynowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) Nieprawidłowy indeks interfejsu routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5702">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5703">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5703">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5704">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5704">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5705">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5705">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5706">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5706">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds a default router for the primary interface at
   fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac to the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version   = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Set the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Set IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(ip_ptr, &router_address,
                                     0xFFFF, PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* Unless invalid pointer input is detected by the error checking
   Service, status return is always NX_SUCCESS. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5719">Usuń Router IPv6 z domyślnej tabeli routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5719">Remove IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5720">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5720">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5721">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5721">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5722">Ta usługa usuwa Router domyślny IPv6 z tabeli routera domyślnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5722">This service deletes an IPv6 default router from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5723">Równoważna usługa NetX IPv4 jest ***nx_ip_gateway_address_clear***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5723">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_clear***.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5724">Ograniczenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5724">Restrictions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5725">Wystąpienie adresu IP zostało utworzone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5725">The IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5726">*router_address* musi wskazywać prawidłowe informacje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5726">*router_address* must point to valid information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5727">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5728">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5728">**ip_ptr** Pointer to a previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5729">**router_address** Wskaźnik na adres domyślnej bramy IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5729">**router_address** Pointer to the IPv6 default gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5730">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5730">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5731">Pomyślnie usunięto router **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5731">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Router successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5732">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5732">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5733">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) nie można znaleźć wpisu routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5733">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) The router entry cannot be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5734">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe wystąpienie adresu IP lub miejsce do magazynowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5734">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5735">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5735">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5736">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0X82) Nieprawidłowa wejściowa niebędąca wskaźnikiem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5736">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x82) Invalid non pointer input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5737">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5738">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5738">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5739">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5739">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5740">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5740">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5741">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5741">Example</span></span>

```c
/*This example removes a default router:fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac */

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router_address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Program the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Delete the IPv6 default router. */
nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete(ip_ptr, &router_address);
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5762">Pobierz domyślny wpis routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5762">Get default router entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5763">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT entry_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_addr,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    ULONG *configuration_method);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5764">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5765">Ta usługa pobiera wpis routera z domyślnej tabeli routingu IPv6, która jest dołączona do określonego urządzenia sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5765">This service retrieves a router entry from the default IPv6 routing table that is attached to a specified network device.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5766">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5766">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5767">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5767">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5768">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5768">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5769">**entry_index** Indeks wpisu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5769">**entry_index** Entry Index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5770">**router_addr** Adres IPv6 routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5770">**router_addr** Router IPv6 Address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5771">**router_lifetime** Wskaźnik do czasu życia routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5771">**router_lifetime** Pointer to router life time</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5772">**PREFIX_LENGTH** Wskaźnik do długości prefiksu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5772">**prefix_length** Pointer to prefix length</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5773">**configuration_method** Wskaźnik do informacji na temat sposobu skonfigurowania wpisu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5773">**configuration_method** Pointer to the information on how the entry was configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5774">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5774">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne uzyskanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5776">Nie znaleziono wpisu routera **NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Router entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5777">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5780">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5781">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5781">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5782">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5782">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5783">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5783">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5784">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5784">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
NXD_ADDRESS            router_addr;
ULONG                  router_lifetime;
ULONG                  prefix_length;
ULONG                  configuration_method;

/* Get the router entry of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get (&ip_0,
                                            PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                            entry_index,
                                            &router_addr,
                                            &router_lifetime,
                                            &prefix_length,
                                            &configuration_method);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entry was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5797">Pobieranie routera IPv6 z tabeli routera domyślnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5797">Retrieve an IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5798">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5798">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5799">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5800">Ta usługa Pobiera domyślny adres routera IPv6, okres istnienia i długość prefiksu w określonym interfejsie fizycznym z tabeli routera domyślnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5800">This service retrieves an IPv6 default router address, lifetime and prefix length on the specified physical interface from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5801">Równoważna usługa NetX IPv4 to \*\**nx_ip_gateway_address_get *.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5801">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is \***nx_ip_gateway_address_get\*.**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5802">*router_address* musi wskazywać prawidłową strukturę NXD_ADDRESS, dzięki czemu ta usługa może wypełnić adres IPv6 routera domyślnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5802">*router_address* must point to a valid NXD_ADDRESS structure, so this service can fill in the IPv6 address of the default router.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5803">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5804">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5804">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5805">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego, za pomocą którego jest dostęp do routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5805">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the router is accessible through</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5806">**router_address** Wskaźnik do miejsca do magazynowania dla wartości zwracanej przez domyślny adres routera w kolejności bajtów hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5806">**router_address** Pointer to the storage space for the return value of the default router address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5807">**router_lifetime** Wskaźnik okresu istnienia routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5807">**router_lifetime** Pointer to the router lifetime</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5808">**PREFIX_LENGTH** Wskaźnik na długość prefiksu adresu routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5808">**prefix_length** Pointer to the router address prefix length</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5809">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) Nieprawidłowy indeks interfejsu routera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5820">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5820">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example retrieves a default router for the primary device
   from the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;
ULONG       router_lifetime;
ULONG       prefix_length;

/* Get IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(ip_ptr, PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     &router_address,
                                     &router_lifetime,
                                     &prefix_length);

/* If status returns NX_SUCCESS, the router address and related
   information is returned successfully. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5834">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5834">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT *num_entries);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5835">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5835">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5836">Ta usługa Pobiera liczbę domyślnych routerów IPv6 skonfigurowanych dla danego interfejsu sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5836">This service retrieves the number of IPv6 default routers configured on a given network interface.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5840">**num_entries** Miejsce docelowe dla liczby routerów IPv6 na określonym urządzeniu sieciowym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5840">**num_entries** Destination for number of IPv6 routers on a specified network device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5842">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne uzyskanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5842">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5843">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5843">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5863">Wyłącz funkcję IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5863">Disable the IPv6 feature</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5864">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5864">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5865">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5866">Ta usługa wyłącza protokół IPv6 dla określonego wystąpienia IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5866">This service disables the IPv6 for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5867">Czyści również domyślną tabelę routera, pamięć podręczną i tabelę adresów IPv6, opuszcza wszystkie grupy multiemisji i resetuje zmienne żądania routera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5867">It also clears the default router table, ND cache and IPv6 address table, leaves the all multicast groups, and resets the router solicitation variables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5868">Ta usługa nie działa, jeśli protokół IPv6 nie jest włączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5868">This service has no effect if IPv6 is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5869">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5869">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5870">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5870">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5871">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5871">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne wyłączenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5873">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5875">Moduł IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) nie został skompilowany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) IPv6 module is not compiled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5877">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5877">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5878">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5878">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5879">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5879">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5880">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5881">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5881">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IPv6 feature on this IP instance. */

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables IPv6 feature on IP instance.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5907">Włącz usługi IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5907">Enable IPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5908">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5908">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5909">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5909">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5910">Ta usługa umożliwia korzystanie z usług IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5910">This service enables IPv6 services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5911">Po włączeniu usług IPv6 wystąpienie protokołu IP jest przyłączane do grupy multiemisji wszystkie węzły (FF02:: 1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5911">When the IPv6 services are enabled, the IP instance joins the all-node multicast group (FF02::1).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5912">Ta usługa nie ustawia adresu lokalnego ani adresu globalnego linku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5912">This service does not set the link local address or global address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5913">Aplikacje powinny używać *nxd_ipv6_address_set* do konfigurowania adresów sieciowych urządzeń.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5913">Applications should use *nxd_ipv6_address_set* to configure the device network addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5914">Nie istnieje odpowiednik NetX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5914">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5915">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5915">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5916">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5916">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5917">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5917">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) protokół IPv6 został pomyślnie włączony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0X15) protokół IPv6 jest już włączony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 is already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5920">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5923">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5924">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5924">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5925">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5925">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5926">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5926">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5927">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5927">Example</span></span>

```c
/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                      pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for IPv6 services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5953">Dołącz do grupy multiemisji IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5953">Join an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5954">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5954">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5955">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5956">Ta usługa umożliwia aplikacji dołączenie do określonego adresu multiemisji IPv6 w określonym interfejsie sieciowym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5956">This service allows an application to join a specific IPv6 multicast address on a specific network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5957">Sterownik linku zostanie powiadomiony o konieczności dodania adresu multiemisji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5957">The link driver is notified to add the multicast address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5958">Ta usługa jest dostępna, jeśli biblioteka NetX Duo została skompilowana z użyciem opcji ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** zdefiniowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5958">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5959">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5959">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5960">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5960">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5961">**group_address** Adres multiemisji IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5961">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5962">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego skojarzonego z grupą multiemisji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5962">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with the multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5963">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5963">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie włącza otrzymywanie przy adresie multiemisji IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables receiving on IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0X17) nie ma więcej wpisów w tabeli multiemisji IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries in the IPv6 multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0X03) nie ma więcej dostępnych adresów grupy w sterowniku urządzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) No more group addresses available in the device driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5967">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) lub funkcja multiemisji IPv6 nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5971">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5972">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5972">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5973">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5973">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5974">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5974">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5975">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5976">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5976">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Join multicast group on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(&ip_0,
                                           &group_address,
                                           PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has joined the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5989">Opuszczanie grupy multiemisji IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5989">Leave an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5990">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5991">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5992">Ta usługa usuwa określony adres multiemisji IPv6 z określonego urządzenia sieciowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5992">This service removes the specific IPv6 multicast address from the specific network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5993">Sterownik łącza jest również powiadamiany o usunięciu adresu multiemisji IPv6. Ta usługa jest dostępna, jeśli biblioteka NetX Duo została skompilowana z użyciem opcji ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** zdefiniowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5993">The link driver is also notified of the removal of the IPv6 multicast address.This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5994">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5994">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5995">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5995">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5996">**group_address** Adres multiemisji IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5996">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5997">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego skojarzonego z grupą</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5997">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5998">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5998">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne opuszczenie multiemisji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6000">Nie znaleziono wpisu **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Entry not found</span></span>

```c

                                            &group_address,

   has left the multicast group. */
```
