## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6024">Wyłącz autokonfigurację adresów bezstanowych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6024">Disable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6025">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6025">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6026">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6027">Ta usługa wyłącza funkcję automatycznej konfiguracji adresów IPv6 na określonym urządzeniu sieciowym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6027">This service disables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6028">Nie ma żadnego efektu, jeśli adres IPv6 został skonfigurowany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6028">It has no effect if the IPv6 address has been configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6029">Ta usługa jest dostępna, jeśli biblioteka NetX Duo została skompilowana z użyciem opcji ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** zdefiniowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6029">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6030">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6031">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6031">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6032">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego, który ma być wyłączony Autokonfiguracja adresu IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6032">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6033">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6033">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie wyłącza funkcję autokonfigurowania adresów bezstanowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disables stateless address autoconfigure feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6035">Funkcja **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6 lub funkcja kontroli konfiguracji bezstanowego adresu IPv6 nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6036">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6039">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6040">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6040">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6041">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6041">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6042">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6042">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6043">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6043">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Disable stateless address auto configuration on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6069">Włącz bezstanową autokonfigurację adresu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6069">Enable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6070">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6071">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6072">Ta usługa włącza funkcję automatycznej konfiguracji adresów IPv6 na określonym urządzeniu sieciowym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6072">This service enables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6073">Ta usługa jest dostępna, jeśli biblioteka NetX Duo została skompilowana z użyciem opcji ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** zdefiniowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6073">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6074">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6074">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6075">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6075">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6076">**interface_index** Indeks interfejsu sieciowego, który powinien być włączony Autokonfiguracja adresów IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6076">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6077">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6077">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie włącza funkcję autokonfiguracji adresu bezstanowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables stateless address autoconfig feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) jest już włączona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6080">Funkcja **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4B) IPv6 lub funkcja kontroli konfiguracji bezstanowego adresu IPv6 nie jest wbudowana w bibliotekę NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6081">Indeks interfejsu **NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik bloku kontroli adresów IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6084">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6085">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6085">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6086">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6086">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6087">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6087">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6088">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6088">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE

/* Enable stateless address auto configuration on this
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6114">Usuwanie wpisu adresu IPv6 w pamięci podręcznej sąsiadów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6114">Delete IPv6 Address entry in the Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6115">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6115">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6116">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6117">Ta usługa usuwa wpis pamięci podręcznej odnajdywania sąsiadów IPv6 dla podanego adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6117">This service deletes an IPv6 neighbor discovery cache entry for the supplied IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6118">Równoważna funkcja NetX IPv4 jest ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6118">The equivalent NetX IPv4 function is ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6119">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6120">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6121">**IP_address** Wskaźnik do adresu IPv6 do usunięcia w kolejności bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6121">**ip_address** Pointer to IPv6 address to delete, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6122">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie usunął adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6124">Nie znaleziono adresu **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) w pamięci podręcznej sąsiadów IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Address not found in the IPv6 neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6125">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotece NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe wystąpienie adresu IP lub miejsce do magazynowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6128">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6128">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6129">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6129">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6130">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6130">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6131">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6131">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6132">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6132">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example deletes an entry from the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Delete an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified IPv6
   address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(&ip_0,
                                   &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was deleted from the neighbor cache
   table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6150">Dodaj mapowanie adresów IPv6/MAC do pamięci podręcznej sąsiadów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6150">Add an IPv6 Address/MAC Mapping to Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6151">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6151">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_ip,
    UINT interface_index, 
    char *mac);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6152">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6152">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6153">Ta usługa dodaje wpis do pamięci podręcznej odnajdywania sąsiadów dla określonego adresu IP *IP_address* mapowany na sprzętowy adres MAC w określonym indeksie interfejsu sieciowego (interface_index).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6153">This service adds an entry to the neighbor discovery cache for the specified IP address *ip_address* mapped to the hardware MAC address on the specified network interface index (interface_index).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6154">Równoważna usługa NetX IPv4 jest ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6154">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6155">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6155">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6156">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6156">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6157">**dest_ip** Wskaźnik do wystąpienia adresu IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6157">**dest_ip** Pointer to IPv6 address instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6158">**interface_index** Indeks określający fizyczny interfejs sieciowy, do którego można skontaktować się z docelowym adresem IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6158">**interface_index** Index specifying physical network interface where the destination IPv6 address can be reached</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6159">komputer **Mac** Wskaźnik na adres sprzętowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6159">**mac** Pointer to hardware address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6160">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6160">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6161">Pomyślnie dodano wpis **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0X43) Nieprawidłowa pamięć podręczna lub brak dostępnych wpisów pamięci podręcznej sąsiadów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Invalid cache or no neighbor cache entries available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6163">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotece NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe wystąpienie adresu IP lub miejsce do magazynowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) Nieprawidłowa wartość indeksu interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index value.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6167">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6168">Inicjalizacja, wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6168">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6169">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6169">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6170">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6170">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6171">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6171">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds an entry on the primary network interface to
   the neighbor cache table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTEFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UCHAR hw_address[6] = {0x0, 0xcf,0x01,0x02, 0x03, 0x04};
CHAR  *mac;

mac = (CHAR *)&hw_address[0];

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Create an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified
   IPv6 address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(&ip_0,
                                &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0],
                                PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mac);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was added to the neighbor
   cache table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6189">Lokalizowanie adresu sprzętowego dla adresu IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6189">Locate Hardware Address for an IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6190">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6190">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6191">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6191">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6192">Ta usługa próbuje znaleźć fizyczny adres sprzętowy w pamięci podręcznej odnajdowania sąsiadów IPv6, która jest skojarzona z podanym adresem IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6192">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied IPv6 address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6193">Indeks interfejsu sieciowego, za pomocą którego można osiągnąć sąsiada, jest również zwracany w parametrze *interface_index.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6193">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned in the parameter *interface_index.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6194">Równoważna usługa NetX IPv4 jest ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6194">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6195">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6195">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6196">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6196">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6197">**IP_address** Wskaźnik na adres IP do znalezienia, kolejność bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6197">**ip_address** Pointer to IP address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6198">**physical_msw** Wskaźnik do pierwszych 16 bitów (47-32) adresu fizycznego w kolejności bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6198">**physical_msw** Pointer to the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6199">**physical_lsw** Wskaźnik do dolnej 32 bitów (31-0) adresu fizycznego w kolejności bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6199">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6200">**interface_index** Wskaźnik do prawidłowej lokalizacji pamięci dla indeksu interfejsu określającego urządzenie sieciowe, na którym można uzyskać dostęp do adresu IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6200">**interface_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the interface index specifying the network device on which the IPv6 address can be reached.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6201">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie odnalazł adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6203">Mapowanie **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) nie znajduje się w pamięci podręcznej sąsiadów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping not in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6204">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotece NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) podany adres IP nie jest w wersji 6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) The supplied IP address is not version 6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe wystąpienie adresu IP lub miejsce do magazynowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6208">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6209">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6209">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6210">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6210">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6211">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6211">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6212">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6212">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs an IP address on the primary network in order
   to obtain the hardware address it is mapped to in the neighbor
   cache able. */

NXD_ADDRESS  ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw, physical_lsw;
UINT  interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Obtain the hardware address mapped to the supplied global IPv6
   address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                            &physical_msw,
                                            &physical_lsw
                                            &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the hardware address returned in
   variables physical_msw and physical_lsw, the index of the network
   interface through which the neighbor can be reached is stored in
   interface_index. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6229">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6229">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6231">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6231">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6232">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6232">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6233">Ta usługa unieważnia całą pamięć podręczną odnajdywania sąsiadów IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6233">This service invalidates the entire IPv6 neighbor discovery cache.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6234">Tę usługę można wywołać przed włączeniem protokołu ICMPv6 lub po nim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6234">This service can be invoked either before or after ICMPv6 has been enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6235">Ta usługa nie ma zastosowania do łączności IPv4, więc nie istnieje NetX równoważna usługa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6235">This service is not applicable to IPv4 connectivity, so there is no NetX equivalent service.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6238">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6239">Pamięć podręczna **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) została pomyślnie unieważniona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cache successfully invalidated</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6240">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotece NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6265">Pobieranie adresu IPv6 dla adresu fizycznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6265">Retrieve IPv6 Address for a Physical Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6266">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6267">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6268">Ta usługa próbuje znaleźć adres IPv6 w pamięci podręcznej odnajdowania sąsiadów IPv6, która jest skojarzona z podanym adresem fizycznym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6268">This service attempts to find an IPv6 address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6269">Zwracany jest również indeks interfejsu sieciowego, za pomocą którego można osiągnąć sąsiada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6269">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6270">Równoważna usługa NetX IPv4 jest ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6270">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6271">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6271">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6272">**ip_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego wystąpienia adresu IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6272">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6273">**IP_address** Wskaźnik do prawidłowej struktury NXD_ADDRESS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6273">**ip_address** Pointer to valid NXD_ADDRESS structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6274">**physical_msw** Pierwsze 16 bitów (47-32) adresów fizycznych do znalezienia, kolejność bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6275">**physical_lsw** Niższa 32 bitów (31-0) adresu fizycznego do znalezienia, kolejność bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6275">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6276">**interface_index** Wskaźnik do indeksu urządzeń sieciowych, za pomocą którego można skontaktować się z adresem IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6276">**interface_index** Pointer to the network device index through which the IPv6 address can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6277">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie odnalazł adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6279">Nie znaleziono adresu fizycznego **NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) w pamięci podręcznej sąsiadów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Physical address not found in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6280">Funkcja IPv6 **NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) nie jest wbudowana w bibliotece NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe wystąpienie adresu IP lub miejsce do magazynowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6283">Adres MAC **NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) to zero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC address is zero.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6285">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6285">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6288">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs a hardware address to search on for the
   matching IPv6 global address in the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw = 0xcf;
ULONG physical_lsw = 0x01020304;
UINT  interface_index;

/* Obtain the IPv6 address mapped to the supplied hardware
   Address on the primary device. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                      physical_msw, physical_lsw,
                                      &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the global IPv6 address returned in
   variable ip_address. */
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6306">Nawiązywanie połączenia TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6307">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6308">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6309">Ta usługa nawiązuje połączenie TCP przy użyciu wcześniej utworzonego gniazda klienta TCP na port określonego serwera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6310">Ta usługa działa w sieciach IPv4 lub IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6311">Prawidłowe porty serwera TCP mieszczą się w zakresie od 0 do 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6312">NetX Duo określa odpowiedni interfejs fizyczny na podstawie adresu IP serwera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6313">Odpowiednik NetX IPv4 jest ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6314">Gniazdo musi być powiązane z portem lokalnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6315">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6316">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego gniazda TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6317">**server_IP** Wskaźnik do adresu docelowego IPv4 lub IPv6 w kolejności bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6318">**SERVER_PORT** Numer portu serwera, z którym ma zostać nawiązane połączenie (od 1 do 0xFFFF) w kolejności bajtów hosta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6319">**WAIT_OPTION** Opcja oczekiwania podczas ustanawiania połączenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6320">Opcje oczekiwania są zdefiniowane w następujący sposób:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6323">**wartość limitu czasu w taktach** (0X00000001 przez 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6324">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne połączenie gniazda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6326">Zażądane zawieszenie **NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) zostało przerwane przez wywołanie tx_thread_wait_abort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0X21) nieprawidłowy adres IPv4 lub IPv6 serwera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6328">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) nie jest powiązane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6329">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) nie jest w stanie zamkniętym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0X37) nie określono oczekiwania, próba połączenia jest w toku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0X4C) Nieprawidłowy indeks interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) interfejs sieciowy nie ma prawidłowego adresu IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP nie jest włączony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0X46) nieprawidłowy port</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6337">Połączenie **NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) nie powiedzie się.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6338">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6339">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6339">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6340">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6340">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6341">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6342">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6367">Pobiera adres IP i numer portu równorzędnego gniazda TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6368">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6369">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6370">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o adresie IP i porcie elementu równorzędnego dla połączonego gniazda TCP za pośrednictwem sieci IPv4 lub IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6371">Równoważna usługa NetX IPv4 jest ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6372">Należy pamiętać, że *socket_ptr* musi wskazywać gniazdo TCP, które jest już w stanie połączonym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6373">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6374">**socket_ptr** Wskaźnik do gniazda TCP połączonego z hostem równorzędnym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6375">**peer_ip_address** Wskaźnik na adres IPv4 lub IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6376">Zwrócony adres IP znajduje się w kolejności bajtów hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6377">**peer_port** Wskaźnik do numeru portu elementu równorzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6378">Zwrócony numer portu znajduje się w kolejności bajtów hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6379">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6380">Pomyślnie pobrano informacje o gnieździe **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6381">Gniazdo **NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) nie jest połączone z elementem równorzędnym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0X14) TCP nie jest włączony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe dane wejściowe wskaźnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6385">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6386">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6387">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6388">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6389">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6414">Wyodrębnij parametry sieci z pakietu UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6415">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6416">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6417">Ta usługa wyodrębnia parametry sieci z pakietu otrzymanego w sieciach IPv4 lub IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6418">NetX równoważna usługa jest ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6419">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6420">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik do pakietu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6420">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6421">**IP_address** Wskaźnik na adres IP nadawcy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6421">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6422">**Protokół** Wskaźnik do protokołu do zwrócenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6422">**protocol** Pointer to protocol to be returned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6423">**port** Wskaźnik na numer portu nadawcy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6423">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6424">**interface_index** Wskaźnik do indeksu interfejsu sieciowego, z którego otrzymuje się ten pakiet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6424">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the network interface from which this packet is received</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6425">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6425">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6426">Pomyślnie wyodrębniono dane interfejsu pakietu **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6427">Pakiet **NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) nie jest IPv4 ani IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is neither IPv4 or IPv6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) nieprawidłowe dane wejściowe wskaźnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6430">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6431">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6432">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6432">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6433">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6433">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6434">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6434">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                    &protocol, &port,
                                    &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6458">Wysyłanie datagramu UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6459">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6460">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6461">Ta usługa wysyła datagram UDP przy użyciu wcześniej utworzonego i powiązanego gniazda UDP dla sieci IPv4 lub IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6462">NetX Duo znajduje odpowiedni lokalny adres IP jako adres źródłowy na podstawie docelowego adresu IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6463">Aby określić konkretny interfejs i źródłowy adres IP, aplikacja powinna używać usługi ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6464">Należy zauważyć, że ta usługa wraca natychmiast niezależnie od tego, czy datagram UDP został pomyślnie wysłany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6465">Odpowiednik usługi NetX (IPv4) jest ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6466">Gniazdo musi być powiązane z portem lokalnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6467">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6467">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6487">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6511">Wysyłanie datagramu UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6511">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6512">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6512">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6513">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6514">Ta usługa wysyła datagram UDP przy użyciu wcześniej utworzonego i powiązanego gniazda UDP dla sieci IPv4 lub IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6515">Parametr *address_index* Określa źródłowy adres IP, który ma być używany dla pakietu wychodzącego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6516">Należy zauważyć, że funkcja zwraca natychmiast bez względu na to, czy datagram UDP został pomyślnie wysłany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6517">Gniazdo musi być powiązane z portem lokalnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6518">Odpowiednik usługi NetX (IPv4) jest ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6541">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6565">Pobierz informacje źródłowe pakietu UPD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6565">Retrieve UPD Packet Source Information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6566">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6566">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6567">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6567">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6568">Ta usługa wyodrębnia źródłowy adres IP i numer portu z pakietu UDP otrzymanego za pośrednictwem gniazda UDP hosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6568">This service extracts the source IP address and port number from a UDP packet received through the host UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6569">Odpowiednik NetX (IPv4) jest ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6569">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent is ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6570">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6571">**packet_ptr** Wskaźnik do odebranego pakietu UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6571">**packet_ptr** Pointer to received UDP packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6572">**IP_address** Wskaźnik do NXD_ADDRESS struktury do przechowywania źródłowego adresu IP pakietu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6572">**ip_address** Pointer to NXD_ADDRESS structure to store packet source IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6573">**port** Wskaźnik do numeru portu gniazda UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6573">**port** Pointer to UDP socket port number</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6574">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6575">Pomyślne wyodrębnienie źródła **NX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6576">Pakiet **NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gniazda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej usługi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6579">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6579">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6580">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6580">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6581">Możliwe przeprowadzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6581">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6582">Nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6582">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f45e-6583">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f45e-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
